programme.desc: A wide-eyed hound leaves his village home to pursue his rock star dream in the big city. Animated family adventure, featuring the voices of Luke Wilson, Eddie Izzard and JK Simmons(n)

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A theatre-owning koala sets up a singing competition in a last-ditch bid to stay afloat. Animation, with the voices of Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Seth MacFarlane and Scarlett Johansson(n)

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Blue-collar caveman Fred Flintstone is promoted to an executive position at work and unwittingly becomes embroiled in an embezzlement scheme - thanks in no small part to his seductive new assistant. Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie O'Donnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor(n)

programme.title: Pete's Dragon
programme.desc: A young boy orphaned by a car crash and left alone in a forest befriends a giant, fire-breathing dragon. Fantasy adventure, starring Bryce Dallas Howard, Robert Redford and Oakes Fegley(n)

programme.title: Chitty Chitty Bang Bang
programme.desc: Eccentric inventor Caractacus Potts rescues an old car from the scrapheap, only to discover it has magical, gravity-defying powers. Meanwhile, Baron Bomburst, the blundering ruler of Vulgaria, will do anything to get his greedy hands on it. Children's musical adventure, based on the book by Ian Fleming, starring Dick Van Dyke, Lionel Jeffries, Sally Ann Howes, Gert Frobe, Benny Hill and James Robertson Justice(n)

programme.title: Dog Eat Dog
programme.desc: A crew of former prisoners are hired by a Cleveland crime syndicate to kidnap the baby of a rival mobster. Thriller, starring Nicolas Cage, Willem Dafoe and Christopher Matthew Cook

programme.title: Anti-Social
programme.desc: Crime drama, following the criminal exploits of anarchic street artist Dee and his violent gang member and jewel thief brother Marcus, who live on a London council estate. Starring Gregg Sulkin and Josh Myers

programme.title: Sam Churchill: Search for a Homeless Man
programme.desc: A seemingly straightforward missing persons case draws a private investigator into a battle against the members of a child pornography ring, who are holding a teenager he has been hired to find. Thriller, starring John Schneider, Robyn Lively, Alex Rocco and Rudy Ramos

programme.title: Public Enemies
programme.desc: Fact-based crime drama following the last years of John Dillinger, whose run of bank robberies and daring prison escapes in the 1930s make him both America's most wanted criminal and a hero to a public struggling through the Depression. His career is soon to be cut short by the birth of the FBI, which assigns its most celebrated agent to bring him to justice. Directed by Michael Mann and starring Johnny Depp, Christian Bale and Marion Cotillard

programme.title: Hoffa
programme.desc: Biopic of the American union leader, who was a key figure in a labour organisation of truck drivers for three decades, a role that brought him into conflict with both the federal government and into dangerous alliances with organised crime - which may have led to his mysterious disappearance. Starring Jack Nicholson, Armand Assante, John C Reilly and Danny DeVito, who also directed

programme.title: Escobar: Paradise Lost
programme.desc: A Canadian surfer on holiday in Colombia falls in love with a local girl, only to discover to his horror that her uncle is the notorious drug kingpin Pablo Escobar. He finds himself forced to become part of Escobar's family business, putting his life on the line as he faces the dangerous reality of the international cocaine trade. Thriller, starring Benicio Del Toro and Josh Hutcherson

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: A suave ex-convict assembles a gang of sophisticated crooks to pull off a daring heist. He intends to rob three of Las Vegas's biggest casinos simultaneously - and also win back his estranged wife, who is now dating the ruthless owner of all three gambling establishments. Steven Soderbergh's crime comedy, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Matt Damon and Bernie Mac

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve
programme.desc: The crooks reunite when an old enemy catches up with them and demands they repay the money they stole from him three years previously. In response, the gang comes up with another larcenous plan - but reckons without the interventions of a fellow thief and a sultry Interpol agent. Crime caper sequel, starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Don Cheadle

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Danny Ocean rounds up his band of crooks for one last heist. Gang member Reuben has been left traumatised and in a coma after being double-crossed by crooked casino owner Willy Bank, and Danny decides that payback is in order. He plans a scheme that will leave Bank penniless, but needs the help of an old enemy. Comedy crime caper sequel, with George Clooney, Al Pacino, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia and Elliott Gould

programme.title: Dick Tracy
programme.desc: An incorruptible Chicago cop launches a relentless campaign to stop a ruthless gangster plotting to take control of the city. But the detective finds himself distracted by the attentions of a seductive nightclub singer and a faceless vigilante playing both sides against the middle. Comic-strip adventure, directed by and starring Warren Beatty, with Madonna, Al Pacino and Dustin Hoffman

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Detectives Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett search for a $100million heroin consignment brazenly stolen by a French drug kingpin from the police evidence room. However, after a mix-up over a phone call from a potential witness, each cop has to assume the other's identity - Lowrey becoming the henpecked family man and Burnett the playboy. Michael Bay's action thriller, starring Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Tea Leoni, Tcheky Karyo and Theresa Randle

programme.title: Death Wish
programme.desc: A family man takes the law into his own hands when his wife is murdered and his daughter is left psychologically traumatised by thugs. Setting out on a one-man crusade to rid the streets of crime, he becomes a hero to the people - and a thorn in the side of the authorities. Vigilante thriller, starring Charles Bronson, Hope Lange and Vincent Gardenia

programme.title: We Still Steal the Old Way
programme.desc: After their exploits in We Still Kill the Old Way, criminal outfit the Archer Gang encounters an old enemy when a daring heist ends with them behind bars. Prison drama, starring Ian Ogilvy, Billy Murray and Lysette Anthony

programme.title: Mississippi Burning
programme.desc: Two mismatched FBI agents, one a tough former sheriff, the other a by-the-book idealist, are sent to a small town in the Deep South to investigate the disappearance of three civil rights activists, only to come up against a conspiracy of silence. Alan Parker's drama set in the 1960s, starring Gene Hackman, Willem Dafoe, Brad Dourif, Michael Rooker, R Lee Ermey and Frances McDormand

programme.title: Deep Family Secrets
programme.desc: A girl sets out on a personal quest to discover the truth about her mother's alleged abduction, and uncovers a tangled tale of adultery, incest and murder. Thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Angie Dickinson and Meg Foster

programme.title: The Hollow Point
programme.desc: A hard-drinking sheriff and his deputy are pitted against a sadistic cartel hitman. Crime thriller, starring Patrick Wilson, Ian McShane and John Leguizamo

programme.title: The Infiltrator
programme.desc: During the 1980s, a chameleonic US agent faces one of the most dangerous assignments of his life when he infiltrates the intricate criminal network of drug kingpin Pablo Escobar. Drama, starring Bryan Cranston, John Leguizamo and Diane Kruger

programme.title: Breakdown
programme.desc: A founding member of a secret society of assassins struggles to cope, as memories of his past misdeeds cause panic attacks and his family starts to fall apart. When he breaks down during the torture of a captive, his employers fear he is no longer reliable - and threaten the lives of his wife and daughter. Action thriller, starring Craig Fairbrass and James Cosmo

programme.title: US Marshals
programme.desc: A federal marshal sets out in pursuit of an escaped prisoner who is determined to prove his murder conviction was false. As the chase progresses, the marshal is forced to work with a diplomatic security agent, making him realise the fugitive is no ordinary convict and that his claims of innocence may be true. Thriller sequel, starring Tommy Lee Jones reprising his Oscar-winning role from The Fugitive, alongside Wesley Snipes and Robert Downey Jr

programme.title: The Hatton Garden Job
programme.desc: A ragtag group of career criminals plot an audacious, multi-million-pound raid on an underground facility in London. True-life crime drama, with Stephen Moyer, Larry Lamb and Matthew Goode

programme.title: Max Payne
programme.desc: A tormented cop searches in vain for the man who killed his wife while also investigating a series of murders connected to an experimental drug that causes nightmarish hallucinations. However, he finds himself pursued by a vengeful woman who thinks he was involved in the death of her sister. Action thriller, based on the video game, starring Mark Wahlberg, Mila Kunis and Beau Bridges

programme.title: Blood Father
programme.desc: An ex-con battles to protect his estranged daughter from the cronies of her cartel member ex. Action thriller, starring Mel Gibson, Erin Moriarty and Diego Luna

programme.title: Mean Machine
programme.desc: A disgraced soccer star jailed for assaulting two policemen is persuaded by the prison authorities to form a football team of inmates to take on the guards. Unfortunately, whipping his fellow prisoners into shape proves a tricky proposition. Comedy drama, starring Vinnie Jones, Jason Statham, David Hemmings and Jason Flemyng

programme.title: Live by Night
programme.desc: A group of Boston-bred gangsters set up shop in balmy Florida during the Prohibition era, facing off against the competition and the Ku Klux Klan. Crime drama, directed by and starring Ben Affleck, with Elle Fanning, Remo Girone and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: Money Train
programme.desc: A New York cop in debt to loan sharks persuades his foster brother and fellow police officer to rob a train carrying all the day's takings from the city's subway network. However, things start to go wrong when a female detective creates rivalry between the pair, and a pyromaniac serial killer threatens their plans. Action comedy, starring Woody Harrelson, Wesley Snipes, Jennifer Lopez and Chris Cooper

programme.title: My Father Die
programme.desc: A deaf mute waits almost two decades to get his hands on his abusive father. Action drama, starring Joe Anderson, John Schneider and Kevin Gage(n)

programme.title: Rise of the Footsoldier II
programme.desc: Haunted by the loss of his best friends in the Essex Range Rover murders, gangster Carlton Leach considers leaving his violent lifestyle behind him. Crime thriller, starring Ricci Harnett, Luke Mably and Steven Berkoff(n)

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet(n)

programme.title: Fugitives
programme.desc: A couple head to the Bahamas, hoping to revive their flagging marriage, but are soon fighting for their lives after being hunted by modern day pirates. Thriller, starring Dominic Purcell, Tricia Helfer and Luke Mably(n)

programme.title: Extortion
programme.desc: When a Caribbean family vacation takes a disastrous turn, a father finds himself at the mercy of a ruthless fisherman, and races against the clock to save his wife and son. Drama, starring Eion Bailey, Bethany Joy Lenz and Barkhad Abdi(n)

programme.title: Level Up
programme.desc: A man is forced to deliver a mysterious package across London for criminals who are holding his girlfriend hostage. Action thriller, starring Josh Bowman, Neil Maskell and William Houston(n)

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year
programme.desc: The presidential election is approaching, but it remains to be seen whether anti-Purge candidate Charlie Roan can survive the night. Action horror, with Frank Grillo, Mykelti Williamson and Elizabeth Mitchell(n)

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: High-functioning autistic number-cruncher Christian Wolff moonlights as a money launderer for the mob. However, the Treasury Department starts closing in on him as the body count rises. Thriller, starring Ben Affleck, Anna Kendrick and JK Simmons(n)

programme.title: Phone Booth
programme.desc: A smart-mouthed PR executive answers a public phone and the caller on the other end warns him that if he hangs up he will be shot. The unseen gunman then puts his target through a tortuous series of mind games, as well as incriminating him in the death of a bystander. Psychological thriller, starring Colin Farrell, Kiefer Sutherland, Katie Holmes and Forest Whitaker(n)

programme.title: Drone
programme.desc: A drone pilot who's spent his career conducting covert operations from the comfort of his own home is finally forced to confront his actions. Thriller, starring Sean Bean, Patrick Sabongui and Mary McCormack(n)

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Twentysomething gun runners David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli win a $300million contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan. Fact based comedy-drama, starring Miles Teller, Jonah Hill and Bradley Cooper(n)

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: High-functioning autistic number-cruncher Christian Wolff moonlights as a money launderer for the mob. However, the Treasury Department starts closing in on him as the body count rises. Thriller, starring Ben Affleck, Anna Kendrick and JK Simmons(n)

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: An inexperienced financial trader is taken under the wing of a corrupt New York corporate raider, who draws him into the shady world of illegal insider dealing with promises of money and power. But the trainee stockbroker questions the morality of his actions when the consequences of a deal strike close to home. Oliver Stone's Oscar-winning drama, starring Michael Douglas, father and son Martin and Charlie Sheen, Daryl Hannah and Terence Stamp(n)

programme.title: End of Days
programme.desc: A world-weary former police officer encounters the Devil himself on New Year's Eve 1999, and is spurred into action to stop the Prince of Darkness exploiting an innocent woman to bring about Armageddon. Supernatural thriller, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Gabriel Byrne, Robin Tunney, Rod Steiger, Kevin Pollak, CCH Pounder and Miriam Margolyes

programme.title: Saw II
programme.desc: The sinister criminal Jigsaw is preparing to mete out his deranged and sadistic form of justice on more hapless victims. Meanwhile, a cop is desperately searching for the madman and the gruesome prison where he is holding eight terrified strangers. Horror sequel, starring Tobin Bell, Donnie Wahlberg, Shawnee Smith and Franky G

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: A young shop assistant in Victorian England enters a magical parallel world in search of a fallen star to give to the girl of his dreams. However, the star in question is in fact a beautiful woman, who he helps flee from a wicked witch and a murderous prince. Fantasy adventure, based on Neil Gaiman's novel, with Charlie Cox, Claire Danes, Michelle Pfeiffer, Robert De Niro, Mark Strong and Sienna Miller. Narrated by Ian McKellen

programme.title: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
programme.desc: A Victorian scientist investigating the mysterious sinking of whaling ships in the Pacific falls overboard during an attack on his vessel. Along with a veteran mariner and a diver, he is picked up and taken captive by Captain Nemo and whisked away on a series of adventures in his futuristic submarine. Disney fantasy, based on Jules Verne's novel, starring Kirk Douglas, James Mason, Paul Lukas and Peter Lorre

programme.title: Arachnophobia
programme.desc: A mild-mannered doctor sets up practice in a small town, but a cloud gathers over his career due to a series of unexplained deaths. Before long, he has to convince the locals that a horde of venomous spiders is responsible and confront his intense fear of arachnids into the bargain. Comedy horror, starring Jeff Daniels, John Goodman, Julian Sands and Brian McNamara

programme.title: The Wicker Man
programme.desc: A devoutly Christian Scottish police officer travels to a remote island to investigate the disappearance of a missing girl. As his investigations are disrupted at every turn, the detective is horrified to see the population have embraced an ancient pagan lifestyle, and begins to fear they may intend to sacrifice the child in an occult ritual. Horror, starring Edward Woodward, Christopher Lee and Britt Ekland

programme.title: Doctor Strange
programme.desc: An American surgeon seeks help from mystics after his hands are damaged in a car crash, but winds up becoming a warrior in an inter-dimensional battle between the forces of light and darkness. Fantasy adventure based on the Marvel comic, starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Mads Mikkelsen and Rachel McAdams

programme.title: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
programme.desc: A Victorian scientist investigating the mysterious sinking of whaling ships in the Pacific falls overboard during an attack on his vessel. Disney fantasy, based on Jules Verne's novel, starring Kirk Douglas, James Mason, Paul Lukas and Peter Lorre

programme.title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: Amnesiac soldier Alice prepares for her last stand-off with the evil Umbrella Corporation. Action horror sequel, starring Milla Jovovich, Ali Larter, Shawn Roberts and Ruby Rose

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: A shy, withdrawn teenager discovers she has paranormal powers, which she uses to protect herself from her abusive mother and classmates. When a friendly student invites her to the prom, she is determined to enjoy herself and is amazed when she is crowned queen of the ball - but joy turns to fury when her tormentors play a cruel prank. Brian De Palma's adaptation of Stephen King's horror novel, with Sissy Spacek, Piper Laurie and Amy Irving

programme.title: Pet
programme.desc: A man bumps into an old crush and becomes so obsessed with her, he holds her captive underneath the animal shelter where he works. Horror thriller, starring Dominic Monaghan, Ksenia Solo and Jennette McCurdy

programme.title: Arachnophobia
programme.desc: A mild-mannered doctor sets up practice in a small town, but a cloud gathers over his career due to a series of unexplained deaths. Before long, he has to convince the locals that a horde of venomous spiders is responsible and confront his intense fear of arachnids into the bargain. Comedy horror, starring Jeff Daniels, John Goodman, Julian Sands and Brian McNamara

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: A corporate risk-management consultant decides whether or not to destroy an artificially created humanoid. Sci-fi thriller, starring Kate Mara, Anya Taylor-Joy and Rose Leslie

programme.title: The Exorcism of Emily Rose
programme.desc: A student dies after an attempted exorcism by a priest who was convinced she was possessed by evil spirits. A sceptical lawyer is assigned to defend the cleric against the charge of manslaughter, but as the case unfolds she finds her own convictions challenged. Horror drama, starring Tom Wilkinson, Laura Linney, Jennifer Carpenter, Campbell Scott and Colm Feore

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: After the re-emergence of the world's first mutant world-destroyer Apocalypse, the X-Men must unite to defeat his extinction level plan. Sci-fi adventure, starring James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender and Jennifer Lawrence

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: After an African American photographer and his white girlfriend visit her wealthy parents, he suspects there's more to the locals than meets the eye. Psychological thriller, starring Daniel Kaluuya, Allison Williams, Bradley Whitford and Caleb Landry Jones

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: After being abducted by a kidnapper with multiple personalities, three young women are soon engaged in a fight for survival. Meanwhile, an oblivious psychiatrist tries to ease her patient's fractured mind as a 24th character attempts to dominate his body. M Night Shyamalan's thriller, starring James McAvoy, Anya Taylor-Joy and Betty Buckley

programme.title: Ouija: Origin Of Evil
programme.desc: In 1967 Los Angeles, a widowed mother and her two daughters add a new stunt to boost their seance scam business. However, they get more than they bargained for when they invite an evil presence into their home. Supernatural horror prequel, starring Elizabeth Reaser and Annalise Basso

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: After the re-emergence of the world's first mutant world-destroyer Apocalypse, the X-Men must unite to defeat his extinction level plan. Sci-fi adventure, starring James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender and Jennifer Lawrence

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The caped crusader and his sidekick Robin discover that four of their worst enemies are now working together. The villains plan to use a machine that turns people into dust at a gathering of world leaders, allowing them to seize power. Comedy adventure based on the TV series, starring Adam West, Burt Ward, Burgess Meredith and Frank Gorshin(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Three eccentric scientists put their hi-tech gadgetry and knowledge of the paranormal to money-making use by setting up in business as freelance ghost catchers. A musician calls them in to investigate when she sees strange creatures in her kitchen, only to end up possessed. As the spook-hunting team members deal with an attempt to shut their operation down, they discover an evil demonic entity is being summoned into existence and it falls to them to stop this creature from destroying the world. Supernatural comedy adventure, starring Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Harold Ramis, Sigourney Weaver, Ernie Hudson and Rick Moranis(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters II
programme.desc: The eccentric spectre-hunters reunite to save New York from a massive river of slime generated by the citizens' negativity and nasty thoughts. Meanwhile, the spirit of a 16th-century tyrant tries to return to the land of the living by possessing the body of a toddler. Sequel to the supernatural comedy, starring Bill Murray, Sigourney Weaver, Dan Aykroyd, Harold Ramis, Rick Moranis and Ernie Hudson(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: When a series of supernatural disturbances occur in New York city, a quartet of investigators and their dim assistant investigate. Reboot of the 1980s comedy franchise, starring Kristen Wiig, Melissa McCarthy, Kate McKinnon, Leslie Jones and Chris Hemsworth(n)

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: In the near future, a cyborg government agent goes in search of a mysterious hacker. Sci-fi fantasy based on an acclaimed comic book, starring Scarlett Johansson, Michael Carmen Pitt and Juliette Binoche(n)

programme.title: The Sixth Sense
programme.desc: A child psychologist, disheartened after the suicide of a former patient, takes on the case of a terrified boy haunted by ghostly apparitions, and tries to help him discover what the spirits want from him. M Night Shyamalan's supernatural thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Haley Joel Osment, Toni Collette and Olivia Williams(n)

programme.title: Ghostbusters

Supernatural comedy adventure, starring Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Harold Ramis, Sigourney Weaver, Ernie Hudson and Rick Moranis(n)

programme.title: The Thing
programme.desc: A mysterious shape-shifting alien kills and impersonates its victims on an Antarctic research base manned by a crew of American scientists. The researchers face the ordeal of stopping the creature from making its way to civilisation - but are in danger of jeopardising the task as mounting paranoia turns them against each other. John Carpenter's sci-fi horror remake, starring Kurt Russell, Wilford Brimley, TK Carter, Keith David and Richard Dysart(n)

programme.title: The Purge: Election Year
programme.desc: The presidential election is approaching, but it remains to be seen whether anti-Purge candidate Charlie Roan can survive the night. Action horror, with Frank Grillo, Mykelti Williamson and Elizabeth Mitchell

programme.title: Risen
programme.desc: A Roman officer and his assistant are charged with investigating what became of Jesus' body following the crucifixion, as the Roman hierarchy fears stories of a resurrected Messiah may lead to an uprising in Jerusalem. However, what they discover during their search forces them to question everything they believe. Biblical drama, starring Joseph Fiennes and Tom Felton

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: A man who has been trapped inside a mysterious jungle board game for 26 years is eventually freed when two children start to play it. Unfortunately, he arrives with a rampaging horde of animals on his heels, leaving only one solution - to finish the game he started all those years ago. Fantasy adventure, starring Robin Williams, Kirsten Dunst and Bonnie Hunt

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show viewers the best of what is on offer on the big screen

programme.title: Cafe Society
programme.desc: In the 1930s, a Bronx youngster heads to Hollywood and falls for the beautiful secretary of his powerful agent uncle. Woody Allen's romantic comedy, starring Steve Carell, Jesse Eisenberg and Kristen Stewart

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: A team of scientists on the International Space Station fight for survival when an intelligent alien life form is brought on board. The creature, nicknamed Calvin, proves it will do anthing to stay alive, and the crew risk everything to ensure it does not make its way to Earth. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Rebecca Ferguson, Ryan Reynolds and Ariyon Bakare

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: After being sentenced to death, murder suspect Callum Lynch enters a virtual world in the search for a device that contains genetic code for free will. Video game adaptation, starring Michael Fassbender, Marion Cotillard, Jeremy Irons and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter Two
programme.desc: When a scheming Italian crime lord holds him to a blood oath, reluctant hitman John Wick goes on another murderous rampage. Action sequel, starring Keanu Reeves, Riccardo Scamarcio and Ian McShane

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: After accidentally knocking Kate Moss into the Thames, hapless champagne-swigging friends Patsy and Edina are hounded by the paparazzi. Comedy based on the BBC sitcom, starring Jennifer Saunders, Joanna Lumley and Julia Sawalha

programme.title: Don't Breathe
programme.desc: A trio of thieves break into the house of a blind man who is not as helpless as he seems, and their hopes of walking away with a massive fortune do not go to plan. Horror, starring Stephen Lang, Jane Levy and Dylan Minnette

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: A fishing boat crew plucks a man out of the sea with two bullet wounds in his back and a safe-deposit number sewn into his skin - but absolutely no memory of who he is or how he got there. In the search for his true identity, he is pursued by assassins - but his skill at evading them suggests his own past is far from straightforward. Thriller, starring Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Chris Cooper, Clive Owen and Brian Cox

programme.title: Abattoir
programme.desc: A reporter investigates the story of a man trying to build a haunted house out of rooms where terrible things have happened. Horror from Saw veteran Darren Lynn Bousman, starring Joe Anderson, Jessica Lowndes and Lin Shaye

programme.title: Finding Altamira
programme.desc: Controversy erupts after the discovery of allegedly ancient cave paintings in northern Spain in 1879. Period drama from Chariots of Fire director Hugh Hudson, starring Antonio Banderas and Golshifteh Farahani

programme.title: 100 Streets
programme.desc: British drama following the tangled, interconnected lives of a group of Londoners, including a womanising former rugby star and his estranged wife. Starring Idris Elba and Gemma Arterton

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show viewers the best of what is on offer on the big screen

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: Robert Langdon awakes with amnesia in an Italian hospital, and is soon on the run with a beautiful doctor. Racing to stop a devastating virus, the Da Vinci Code expert suffers shocking visions as an assassin closes in. Thriller, starring Tom Hanks, Felicity Jones and Irrfan Khan

programme.title: Why Him
programme.desc: A protective dad is far from thrilled when his daughter begins dating a foul-mouthed playboy millionaire. Comedy, starring Bryan Cranston, James Franco and Zoey Deutch

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Years after two enemy pilots land on a mysterious island, a top-secret mission to the same region descends into chaos when the local wildlife proves far from welcoming. Action adventure, starring Tom Hiddleston, Samuel L Jackson and Brie Larson

programme.title: Billy Lynn's Long Halftime Walk
programme.desc: A 19-year-old private is brought home for a victory tour after a harrowing Iraq battle, as flashbacks show what really happened to his squad - contrasting the realities of war with America's perceptions. Drama, starring Joe Alwyn, Garrett Hedlund and Arturo Castro

programme.title: Inferno

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: A disorganised woman is asked to be maid of honour at her best friend's wedding. Taking charge of the prenuptial bridal celebrations, she resolves to give her pal and accompanying bridesmaids the time of their lives, but as her efforts slide into chaos she finds the wife of the groom's boss is keen to usurp her position. Comedy, with Kristen Wiig, Rose Byrne and Melissa McCarthy

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: The amnesiac assassin is living quietly in hiding, until his former employers come after him again and murder his girlfriend. A CIA operation has ended in disaster, and those responsible intend to clear their names by implicating Bourne. As the former secret agent tries to evade the hitmen on his trail, he also struggles to piece together the truth about his past. Action thriller sequel, starring Matt Damon, Brian Cox, Joan Allen and Julia Stiles(n)

programme.title: Aftermath
programme.desc: A hard-working construction worker is forced to deal with life-shattering loss when his family are killed in a plane crash. Drama, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Scoot McNairy and Maggie Grace(n)

programme.title: Michael Jackson's This Is It
programme.desc: Documentary following rehearsals for the singer's planned 50-night series of concerts at London's O2, immediately before his untimely death in 2009. Featuring interviews with Jackson, performances of classic hits including Billy Jean and Wanna Be Startin' Something, and an insight into the elaborate preparations for the shows that were never staged(n)

programme.title: The Great Wall: Special
programme.desc: A look at the epic action adventure starring Matt Damon, Pedro Pascal and Willem Dafoe(n)

programme.title: Miss Peregrine's Home For Peculiar Children
programme.desc: A misfit teen discovers an island orphanage that's home to children with very special gifts, but the forces of darkness are soon snapping at his heels. Tim Burton's adaptation of the cult Ransom Riggs novel, starring Asa Butterfield, Eva Green and Samuel L Jackson(n)

programme.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: In a galaxy far, far away, maverick scientist's daughter Jyn Erso and the Rebel Alliance attempt to steal plans for a battle station capable of destroying entire worlds - the Death Star. Star Wars prequel set before the events of A New Hope, starring Felicity Jones, Diego Luna and Ben Mendelsohn(n)

programme.title: Logan
programme.desc: In the near future, Wolverine cares for an ailing Professor X somewhere on the Mexican border. However, the razor-clawed hero's attempts to hide from the world are turned upside down when a young mutant arrives, pursued by lethal forces. Fantasy adventure, starring Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Dafne Keen and Stephen Merchant(n)

programme.title: Alice Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: Alice returns to the magical world of Underland and takes a journey back in time to save her friends. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Mia Wasikowska and Johnny Depp(n)

programme.title: Miss Peregrine's Home For Peculiar Children
programme.desc: A misfit teen discovers an island orphanage that's home to children with very special gifts, but the forces of darkness are soon snapping at his heels. Tim Burton's adaptation of the cult Ransom Riggs novel, starring Asa Butterfield, Eva Green and Samuel L Jackson(n)

Star Wars prequel set before the events of A New Hope, starring Felicity Jones, Diego Luna and Ben Mendelsohn(n)

programme.title: Logan

However, the razor-clawed hero's attempts to hide from the world are turned upside down when a young mutant arrives, pursued by lethal forces. Fantasy adventure, starring Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Dafne Keen and Stephen Merchant(n)

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: Horror sequel, starring Vera Farmiga and Patrick Wilson. Paranormal investigators battle sinister supernatural forces in London(n)

programme.title: Atonement
programme.desc: In 1935, 13-year-old Briony Tallis discovers the burgeoning relationship between her older sister Cecilia and Robbie Turner, a servant's son whom she has a crush on herself. The teenager becomes increasingly jealous of the pair and spitefully accuses him of a crime he did not commit, unaware her actions will have tragic repercussions. Joe Wright's romantic period drama, based on Ian McEwan's novel, starring Keira Knightley, James McAvoy, Brenda Blethyn, Saoirse Ronan and Romola Garai

programme.title: BSL Zone
programme.desc: A trilogy about Dr Paddy Ladd, the man who coined the term 'deafhood'

programme.title: War of the Wildcats
programme.desc: An ambitious cowboy engages in a bitter personal feud with a powerful oil baron in a battle for the rights to drill on sacred native American land, and when both men fall for the same woman, the conflict between them gets even uglier. Western adventure, starring John Wayne, Albert Dekker, Martha Scott and Gabby Hayes

programme.title: Arabian Nights
programme.desc: The story of two half-brothers - one the heroic caliph, the other an evil usurper - as they do battle for the right to rule their kingdom, and win the hand of beautiful dancer Sherazade. Adaptation of the classic adventure tales, starring Jon Hall, Maria Montez, Sabu and Leif Erickson

programme.title: The Mark of Zorro
programme.desc: An aristocratic 19th-century swordsman returns to his native California from Spain to find the people living under the rule of a cruel tyrant. He adopts the guise of a masked avenger, fighting to protect the poor and downtrodden, while playing the foppish nobleman in his day-to-day life to avoid suspicion. Swashbuckling adventure, with Tyrone Power and Basil Rathbone

programme.title: Rear Window
programme.desc: A photographer is left housebound and in a wheelchair after breaking his leg in an accident. He passes the time watching the comings and goings of his neighbours in the apartment block opposite and becomes convinced one of them has committed a murder. However, he has trouble persuading anyone to believe his story. Hitchcock thriller, starring James Stewart, Grace Kelly, Raymond Burr, Thelma Ritter and Judith Evelyn

programme.title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: A scientist carries out genetic experiments on apes, hoping to find a cure for Alzheimer's disease. A chimpanzee used in the tests develops superior intelligence and becomes outraged at the human race's cruel treatment of his kind, forming his fellow primates into an army to overthrow mankind. Sci-fi thriller, starring James Franco, Freida Pinto and Andy Serkis

programme.title: Lincoln
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's biopic of the 16th president of the United States. In his tumultuous final months in office, Abraham Lincoln faces a struggle to bring the Civil War to an end and unite a divided nation, while also bringing about legislation to abolish slavery. Starring an Oscar-winning Daniel Day-Lewis, with Tommy Lee Jones, Sally Field and Joseph Gordon-Levitt

programme.title: Chain Reaction
programme.desc: Two scientists devise a revolutionary process to produce energy from water - but instead of receiving professional acclaim, their work is subject to hi-tech sabotage. The pair are then framed for the murder of their mentor and forced to go on the run to clear their names. Action thriller, starring Keanu Reeves, Rachel Weisz, Morgan Freeman, Fred Ward and Brian Cox

programme.title: 21 & Over
programme.desc: A hard-working student's 21st birthday falls the day before an important interview for medical school. His friends persuade him to come out with them and celebrate, but what was supposed to be one quiet drink rapidly turns into a raucous night of debauchery. Comedy, starring Justin Chon and Miles Teller

programme.title: Terror in a Texas Town
programme.desc: An embittered Scandinavian seaman sets out to avenge the murder of his farmer father, who was killed after refusing to bow to the demands of a ruthless land baron. Western, starring Sterling Hayden, Sebastian Cabot, Carol Kelly and Eugene Martin

programme.title: Warlock
programme.desc: A ruthless vigilante is recruited as a sheriff to clean up the streets of a crime-ridden town, but his strong-arm tactics soon antagonise the townsfolk. When a woman turns up and accuses the lawman of murdering her fiance, the residents rally to her cause with the help of a rival gunslinger. Western, starring Henry Fonda, Richard Widmark, Anthony Quinn, DeForest Kelley and Dorothy Malone

programme.title: Posse from Hell
programme.desc: Bandits invade a frontier town, rob the bank, kill the sheriff and kidnap a local woman. A tough gunslinger who was a friend of the dead lawman takes on the job of bringing them to justice, but the only one of the townspeople willing to help is a naive banker determined to prove his worth. Western, starring Audie Murphy, John Saxon, Vic Morrow and Lee Van Cleef

programme.title: The Wackiest Ship in the Army
programme.desc: A naval officer is given the command of an old sailing ship to undertake a very important mission - to transport an Australian agent into enemy waters so he can spy on the Japanese. However, he finds the ship is falling apart at the seams and is manned by a crew that does not know how to sail her. Second World War comedy, with Jack Lemmon, Ricky Nelson, John Lund, Chips Rafferty and Tom Tully

programme.title: Volcano
programme.desc: A river of molten lava spews from an erupting volcano onto the streets of Los Angeles, prompting the head of a crisis agency to team up with an intrepid scientist in a frantic and dangerous bid to save the city's residents. Disaster thriller, starring Tommy Lee Jones, Anne Heche, Gaby Hoffmann, Keith David and Don Cheadle

programme.title: 13 Hours: The Secret Soldiers of Benghazi
programme.desc: Premiere. A US embassy in Libya comes under attack from extremists, who kill the ambassador. With no help in sight, a small band of CIA security operatives from various military backgrounds takes a stand to fight off the attackers and protect the remaining diplomatic personnel. Fact-based action thriller, starring John Krasinski and James Badge Dale

A British soldier deployed to Belfast in 1971, almost immediately finds himself caught up in a riot. In the aftermath, he becomes separated from the rest of his unit. Lost and alone at night in a hostile and unfamiliar area, he makes a disturbing journey in search of safety. Thriller, starring Jack O'Connell and Richard Dormer

programme.title: Goon
programme.desc: An underachieving bouncer is the black sheep of a family of doctors, until he beats an ice hockey player in a fight, and is recruited by the team. While he has little sporting prowess, his ability to beat up opposing players leads him to a successful career - and a showdown with his equally violent hero. Comedy, starring Seann William Scott, Jay Baruchel and Liev Schreiber(n)

programme.title: Harvey
programme.desc: An amiable drunk claims to have a six-foot invisible rabbit named Harvey as a friend, to the horror of his social-climbing sister. Having been embarrassed by her brother once too often, she tries to have him committed to an asylum, but things do not go according to plan as her sibling's gentle nature wins over those around him. Comedy, starring James Stewart and Josephine Hull(n)

programme.title: Destry
programme.desc: A ruthless mobster and his cronies take over a small frontier town. When the local sheriff dies in mysterious circumstances, he appoints a drunk to office to consolidate his power. However, the inebriated official calls for the son of famous lawman to be his deputy and the new inclusion shows a fierce determination to see justice reign. Western, starring Audie Murphy, Mari Blanchard and Lyle Bettger(n)

programme.title: Yangtse Incident
programme.desc: A British frigate is heavily shelled and captured by Chinese communists on the Yangtse River in 1949. After a failed rescue mission by a sister ship, the remaining crew members put into action a daring escape plan that involves disguising the vessel and slipping her moorings under the cover of darkness. Fact-based action adventure, starring Richard Todd, William Hartnell and Akim Tamiroff(n)

programme.title: The Tin Star
programme.desc: A world-weary bounty hunter, formerly a sheriff, arrives in a small town where a newly-appointed lawman is struggling to keep the peace. When he learns of the mercenary's past, the inexperienced lawman seeks his help in learning the tricks of the trade so he can bring an outlaw gang to justice. Anthony Mann's Western, starring Henry Fonda, Anthony Perkins, Lee Van Cleef, Betsy Palmer and Michel Ray(n)

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: Two science teachers investigate a mysterious meteor and discover it is oozing a strange fluid containing millions of minuscule but rapidly evolving organisms - which start to turn into terrifying alien monsters with a taste for human flesh. Sci-fi comedy, starring David Duchovny, Orlando Jones, Julianne Moore, Seann William Scott, Dan Aykroyd and Ted Levine(n)

programme.title: The Dressmaker
programme.desc: Premiere. An Australian fashion designer returns to her remote home town in the 1950s after forging a successful career in Paris. She reconciles with her mother, falls in love and transforms the lives of the local women - getting even with her enemies in the process. Drama based on the novel by Rosalie Ham, starring Kate Winslet, Judy Davis, Hugo Weaving and Liam Hemsworth(n)

programme.title: Easy A
programme.desc: A misfit teenage girl lies about her non-existent sexual history, and soon becomes the talk of the school. While she endures the harassment of conservative classmates, she grows to love the attention and sets out to create yet more rumours - but is unprepared when things get out of hand. Teen comedy, starring Emma Stone, Penn Badgley and Amanda Bynes(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jim Bob's dreams of joining the air force are dashed when he finds out his vision is not good enough, while Mary Ellen tries to set Erin up with a friend of Curt

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jason struggles to complete a major musical composition for his course, and a plan for a Walton's Mountain Founders' Day develops to help inspire him in his task

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: To save him from farmer Parson's shotgun, Laura adopts a mischievous billy goat and names him Fred. However, she finds the creature is more trouble than she bargained for

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The townsfolk draw inspiration form Rev Alden's principles and try not to rise to the Galinder brothers' troublemaking

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd faces a malpractice suit from a high-risk pregnancy patient and begins to doubt her decision to end her therapy sessions. Joanie and Phil go on a purely platonic date - but soon find their feelings getting in the way of their friendship. Ashley Johnson and Isabella Hoffman guest star

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd feels oppressed in the aftermath of the malpractice suit and Jim returns to full-time work under Sam's watchful eye. Tina seeks professional advice about childbirth, and learns she may have to undergo surgery to conceive

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Part two of two. Scotty and Diane plan to adopt Todd, which results in the boy and his brother being caught up in a bitter custody battle. Paul Walker and Josh Brolin guest star

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: A man gets trapped in a car at the bottom of a hill, so his dog goes in search of help - and finds Jonathan and Mark

programme.title: Relative Stranger
programme.desc: An American football player who walked out on his wife and children six years earlier is forced to face up to his past mistakes as he attends his father's funeral. Reunited with the family he abandoned, he tries to rebuild their relationship - but begins to wonder whether they would be better off without him. Drama, starring Eriq La Salle and Michael Michele

programme.title: Coco Chanel
programme.desc: Part one of two. Drama telling the story how unassuming French seamstress Coco Chanel rose to become one the most influential fashion designers of the 20th Century. This first part follows the young Coco through her childhood as an orphan to her early days as a dressmaker's assistant. Shirley MacLaine and Malcolm McDowell star

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Kind-hearted John-Boy gives up a date with a beautiful woman to accompany an elderly Scottish lady on the most important journey of her life

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Kyle decides he needs to get away from family and friends, whose over-solicitous behaviour is delaying his recovery, while Jim is upset at being dropped from his TV show

programme.title: Friendly Fire
programme.desc: A distraught woman struggles to overcome a wall of silence to find out the truth about her soldier son's death during the Vietnam War. As revelations about his accidental shooting emerge, the mourning mother launches a crusade against America's involvement in the conflict. Drama based on a true story, starring Carol Burnett, Ned Beatty, Sam Waterson and Dennis Erdman

programme.title: Narrow Escape
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a valiant US Navy crew's desperate attempts to rescue an endangered child from post-war Korea. Starring Gerald McRaney, Richard Thomas and Jonathan Banks

programme.title: The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie
programme.desc: Drama based on Muriel Spark's novel set in 1930s Edinburgh about the unorthodox methods of an eccentric teacher. Frustrated by students she perceives as provincial and unwilling to marry her wealthy suitor, Miss Brodie seeks an appointment at the elite Marcia Blaine School for Girls. Starring Geraldine McEwan

programme.title: The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie
programme.desc: Miss Brodie is successful in her interview, and prepares to face her class for the first time. However, she offends the conservative Miss Gaunt and draws the attention of handsome and married art teacher Teddy Lloyd. Geraldine McEwan stars

programme.title: Legends of the Fall
programme.desc: A retired army colonel has raised his three sons alone on their remote Montana ranch. But the all-male household is thrown into turmoil when the youngest son brings home his beautiful fiancee, causing jealousy and tensions that culminate in tragedy. Edward Zwick's period drama, starring Anthony Hopkins, Brad Pitt, Aidan Quinn, Julia Ormond and Henry Thomas

programme.title: Taggart
programme.desc: A medical researcher accuses a rival doctor of attacking him with a syringe full of lethal drugs, but when he is later found murdered, the bitter feud between the two medics turns out to be just the tip of the iceberg for DCI Burke and the team. Both men have many enemies, especially after their drug trials resulted in a woman's death, and affairs of the heart muddy the water for the detectives in their search for the real killer. Drama, starring Blythe Duff and Alex Norton

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part one of two. John searches for a missing soldier, Jim Bob is attacked by a grieving father, and the family receives distressing news from the front line

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part two of two. John searches for a missing soldier, Jim Bob is attacked by a grieving father, and the family receives distressing news from the front line

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part two of two. Charles is badly injured while walking in the woods with Laura, and only a blind man can save their lives. Guest starring Burl Ives

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd meets her attorney to discuss the malpractice suit, but a clash of egos puts her defence in jeopardy when she realises he is even more stubborn than she is. George Newbern guest stars

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd's efforts to help a gang member result in her being implicated in a shooting, and she worries that this further brush with the law can only harm her case in the impending malpractice suit. Drama, starring Milina Kanakarades and Mike Farrell

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.sub-title: Another Kind of War, Another Kind of Peace.
programme.desc: Jonathan tells a man that his son fathered a child during the Vietnam war, but finds him reluctant to accept his grandson when they are united. Ernest Borgnine guest stars

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: A TV star who plays a kindly family man is a cruel bully in real life, but Jonathan tries to make him change his ways. Ned Beatty guest stars

programme.title: A Kind of Loving
programme.desc: A factory worker gets his girlfriend pregnant, forcing them to endure years of misery and dashed hopes as they marry and move in with her disapproving, nagging mother. John Schlesinger's drama, starring Alan Bates, June Ritchie and Thora Hird

programme.title: Coco Chanel
programme.desc: Part two of two. The remarkable life of seamstress Coco Chanel, who was an impoverished child living in an orphanage until she became a dress-maker's assistant, and from there rose to become a pioneering icon and the owner of France's leading fashion house. Drama, starring Shirley MacLaine and Malcolm McDowell

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy's peace and quiet is disrupted by an old schoolfriend who desperately needs his help. Sissy Spacek guest stars

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd arrives home for the Christmas holidays, and begins to reflect on whether her return to Providence means anything - until a dream about what the town would be like without her convinces her she has made a difference

programme.title: The Man Who Captured Eichmann
programme.desc: Fact-based thriller based on the hunt for Nazi war criminal Adolf Eichmann, who disappeared after the war but was ultimately traced to South America. Starring Robert Duvall, Arliss Howard, Jeffrey Tambor and Joel Brooks

programme.title: The Scarlet and the Black
programme.desc: Fact-based Second World War drama about Monsignor Hugh O'Flaherty, a cleric who rescued thousands of PoWs and Italian resistance fighters from the Gestapo. Starring Gregory Peck, Christopher Plummer and John Gielgud

programme.title: The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie
programme.desc: Having fallen under the spell of their passionate, charismatic teacher, pupils Sandy and Jenny fuel their romantic fantasies with made-up stories and try to convince Miss Brodie to tell them the facts of life

programme.title: The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie
programme.desc: An Italian parent complains about Miss Brodie's respect and admiration for Mussolini. Starring Geraldine McEwan

programme.title: United
programme.desc: Feature-length drama charting the story of the `Busby Babes' - the Manchester United side who became the youngest-ever winners of the English Football League in 1956. Having won the league again in 1957, the team reaches the quarter-finals of the European Cup in 1958 - but disaster strikes as they return from the match in Belgrade, when their charter plane crashes following a refuelling stop in Munich. The disaster claims the lives of 23 people, including eight players - and with manager Matt Busby in a critical condition, coach Jimmy Murphy tries to rebuild the shattered team. Starring David Tennant, Jack O'Connell, Sam Claflin and Dougray Scott

programme.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Avenging Ace
programme.desc: The crusading attorney risks his reputation in a bid to clear the name of a high-flying air force pilot wrongly imprisoned for murder. Mystery, starring Barbara Hale, William Katt, Larry Wilcox and Erin Gray

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A cousin comes to stay with the family, bringing her grandchildren, and becomes determined to make Olivia's life easier(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John cannot find his high school diploma, so is forced to take a test to prove to the army that he graduated. Mary Ellen takes over from the county nurse(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Christmas is coming and the children are stranded as a blizzard strikes Walnut Grove(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Charles and Caroline are shocked to discover Mary has accepted a proposal of marriage, but reluctantly give their consent. Pioneering drama, starring Michael Landon(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd sets off with Joanie to deliver a speech to a group of medical students in Los Angeles, leading to a chance encounter with a former boyfriend. Drama, starring Melina Kanakaredes(n)

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd continues to feel like her life is adrift after being banned from practicing medicine. Morgan Fairchild guest stars(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan meets another angel, who tries to sabotage his latest mission when it involves his human life(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Part one of two. Jonathan turns back time to show a couple what their lives would be like if they had never met each other(n)

programme.title: And the Beat Goes On: The Sonny and Cher Story
programme.desc: Biopic of the 1960s duo, charting their rise to global acclaim in the music world with hit songs such as I Got You Babe, All I Really Want to Do and It's the Little Things, before probing their much-publicised personal problems, which culminated in an acrimonious divorce. Starring Renee Faia and Jay Underwood(n)

programme.title: Queen
programme.desc: Historical drama telling the life story of a young slave girl named Queen, whose skin tone allowed her to pass herself off as a white woman. Based on the novel Queen: The Story of an American Family by Alex Haley and David Stevens. Starring Halle Berry, Danny Glover, Tucker Stone, Jasmine Guy, Tim Daly, Martin Sheen, Paul Winfield, Raven-Symone and Ann-Margret(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A family misunderstanding prompts Grandpa to walk out, leaving everyone else in a state of shock(n)

programme.title: Providence

programme.title: United

programme.title: Betty & Coretta
programme.desc: The widows of Martin Luther King and Malcolm X are left to raise their children alone following the assassination of their husbands. A close and supportive friendship develops between them as they deal with the challenges ahead and take up leading positions in the struggle for racial equality. Fact-based drama, with Angela Bassett and Mary J Blige(n)

programme.title: The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie

programme.desc: With famous ballerina Anna Pavlova due to appear in Edinburgh. the eccentric teacher insists her girls experience this important cultural event, and enthusiastically predicts the future stardom of one of her students. Starring Geraldine McEwan(n)

programme.title: Mystic Pizza
programme.desc: Three pizza parlour waitresses reach turning points in their lives, but help each other through their problems. Kat falls for a man whose kids she babysits while about to head off to university, her sister Daisy starts dating a man from a richer background, and their friend Jojo has cold feet about her wedding. Comedy, starring Julia Roberts, Annabeth Gish and Lili Taylor(n)

programme.title: Perry Mason: The Case of the Lady in the Lake
programme.desc: Raymond Burr stars as the ace attorney, whose investigation into the lakeside disappearance of a married heiress leads him to uncover a sinister conspiracy. Murder mystery, with Barbara Hale, William Katt, David Ogden Stiers and David Hasselhoff(n)

programme.title: Take Me Home: The John Denver Story
programme.desc: Biopic of the country singer, charting his childhood as the son of an overbearing air force officer, his early brush with fame in the Chad Mitchell Trio and his rise to success as a solo artist, despite a string of personal traumas - before his ill-fated flight over Monterey Bay. Starring Chad Lowe, Kristin Davis, Gerald McRaney and Brian Markinson

programme.title: Providence

programme.title: Highway to Heaven

Reunited with the family he abandoned, he tries to rebuild their relationship - but begins to wonder whether they would be better off without him. Drama, starring Eriq La Salle and Michael Michele

programme.title: Coco Chanel
programme.desc: Part one of two. Drama telling the story how unassuming French seamstress Coco Chanel rose to become one the most influential fashion designers of the 20th Century. programme.title: The Waltons

As revelations about his accidental shooting emerge, the mourning mother launches a crusade against America's involvement in the conflict. Drama based on a true story, starring Carol Burnett, Ned Beatty, Sam Waterson and Dennis Erdman

programme.title: Narrow Escape
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a valiant US Navy crew's desperate attempts to rescue an endangered child from post-war Korea. Starring Gerald McRaney, Richard Thomas and Jonathan Banks

programme.title: The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie
programme.desc: Drama based on Muriel Spark's novel set in 1930s Edinburgh about the unorthodox methods of an eccentric teacher. Frustrated by students she perceives as provincial and unwilling to marry her wealthy suitor, Miss Brodie seeks an appointment at the elite Marcia Blaine School for Girls. Starring Geraldine McEwan

Edward Zwick's period drama, starring Anthony Hopkins, Brad Pitt, Aidan Quinn, Julia Ormond and Henry Thomas

programme.title: Taggart

Drama, starring Blythe Duff and Alex Norton

programme.title: Providence
programme.desc: Syd's efforts to help a gang member result in her being implicated in a shooting, and she worries that this further brush with the law can only harm her case in the impending malpractice suit. Drama, starring Milina Kanakarades and Mike Farrell

programme.desc: A TV star who plays a kindly family man is a cruel bully in real life, but Jonathan tries to make him change his ways. Ned Beatty guest stars

programme.desc: Part two of two. programme.desc: Fact-based Second World War drama about Monsignor Hugh O'Flaherty, a cleric who rescued thousands of PoWs and Italian resistance fighters from the Gestapo. Starring Gregory Peck, Christopher Plummer and John Gielgud

programme.title: The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie
programme.desc: Having fallen under the spell of their passionate, charismatic teacher, pupils Sandy and Jenny fuel their romantic fantasies with made-up stories and try to convince Miss Brodie to tell them the facts of life

programme.title: The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie

programme.title: United
programme.desc: Feature-length drama charting the story of the `Busby Babes' - the Manchester United side who became the youngest-ever winners of the English Football League in 1956. Having won the league again in 1957, the team reaches the quarter-finals of the European Cup in 1958 - but disaster strikes as they return from the match in Belgrade, when their charter plane crashes following a refuelling stop in Munich. The disaster claims the lives of 23 people, including eight players - and with manager Matt Busby in a critical condition, coach Jimmy Murphy tries to rebuild the shattered team. programme.title: United

Miller) and his CTO (Jason Bateman) must rally their co-workers and host an epic office Christmas party in an effort to impress a potential client and close a sale that will save their jobs. Also stars Olivia Munn, Vanessa Bayer, Courtney B. Vance, Rob Corddry and Kate McKinnon

programme.title: Rush: Time Stand Still
programme.desc: Narrated by Paul Rudd, this documentary chronicles the final major tour of legendary rock band Rush. Featuring interviews with the band and never-before seen footage, the film features behind-the-scenes views of historic moments from the perspective of the band, their fans, crew and management throughout their sold-out 40th anniversary tour

programme.title: Tim & Faith: Soul2Soul
programme.desc: Includes live performances from Tim McGraw and Faith Hill's 2017 Soul2Soul world tour, as well as an intimate look inside their relationship. Never before seen interviews are presented along side behind-the-scenes footage, capturing their chemistry on and off the stage. Directed and executive produced by the award-winning team of Dan Cutforth and Jane Lipsitz

programme.title: Whitney. "Can I Be Me"
programme.desc: Directors Nick Broomfield and Rudi Dolezal weave never before seen video, candid interviews and behind the scenes performance footage into a raw and uncensored portrait of Whitney Houston, who died suddenly at age 48 after years of struggling with addiction. Exploring her far-reaching impact, the directors focus on Houston's central dilemma: even though she had made millions of dollars and was recognized as having one of the greatest voices of all time, she still couldn't do what she wanted, either professionally or in her personal life(c)

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman, Matthew Broderick and Christopher Walken star in this satirical remake of the classic thriller about a planned community where the picture-perfect women are a little too eerily flawless. Glenn Close, Bette Midler, Jon Lovitz and Roger Bart costar in this wickedly acerbic comedy from writer Paul Rudnick ("Addams Family Values," "In & Out")

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind

programme.title: G.I. Jane
programme.desc: Demi Moore stars as gutsy Lieutenant O'Neil, the first woman ever given the opportunity to earn a place in the armed forces most highly skilled combat unit - the elite Navy SEALS. But the already brutal rigors of training camp turn into an unimaginable test of courage and determination once it becomes clear that no one - not powerful politicians, top military brass, or her male Navy SEAL teammates - wants her to succeed!

programme.desc: An unflinching documentary look inside America's heroin crisis. In Guerrero, Mexico, Don Miguel braces for competition as he struggles to keep control of the local poppy fields and protect his area. Back in Columbus, Ohio, Detective Mark Edwards orchestrates a traffic stop to close in on a local heroin dealer and starts to work his way up the chain. In Atlanta, Skyler moves back home with his parents to get clean, but a relapse threatens to tear his family apart. Series premiere(c)

programme.title: Arsenal
programme.desc: Family loyalty is tested when a successful businessman (Adrian Grenier) is willing to do anything for his deadbeat brother (Johnathon Schaech) — including tracking down the vicious mobster (Nicolas Cage) holding him hostage

programme.title: I Hope They Serve Beer In Hell
programme.desc: His debauched lifestyle and outrageous behavior at his friend's bachelor party gets a hedonistic young man uninvited to the wedding, a situation he tries to remedy by reforming his pleasure-driven, egocentric ways in this bawdy comedy starring Jesse Bradford, Matt Czuchry and Geoff Stults

programme.title: Nick Cannon: Stand Up, Don't Shoot
programme.desc: Comedian Nick Cannon is back - and using his potent voice to attack the haters and naysayers, while discussing everything from the controversial times we're living in to how getting old affects his dating. Plus, there's Nick's scoop on how a trip to Australia was the straw that broke his marriage to Mariah Carey's back. Filmed live at the Ebony Repertory Theatre in South Central Los Angles

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Having done his best to keep Buddy buried in his subconscious, the portly Professor Sherman Klump (Eddie Murphy) is horrified to find him resurfacing in untimely outbursts, and threatening his marriage plans to colleague Denise Gains (Janet Jackson). Sherman decides to rid himself of his lecherous alter-ego once and for all, but Buddy emerges into his world and lays claim to the professor's youth serum. Buddy heads to Sherman's family home for the drug, but he'll have to deal with the entire Klump family first

programme.title: The Mist
programme.desc: A horrifying short story by Stephen King becomes this engrossing chiller about the survivors of a strange, mutating mist that invades a small town and brings with it unspeakable monsters. Thomas Jane, Laurie Holden, Andre Braugher, Marcia Gay Harden and William Sadler star in this film directed by Frank Darabont ("The Shawshank Redemption")

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: By day, American in Paris Maureen (Kristen Stewart) works as a personal shopper, motor-biking around the city buying up deluxe couture for a celebrity client. By night, she attempts to channel the spirits of the dead, hoping to make contact with her recently deceased twin brother. When Maureen begins receiving a series of chilling, increasingly sinister text messages, it seems she may have made contact - but she doesn't know with whom

programme.title: The Light Between Oceans
programme.desc: Lighthouse keeper Tom Sherbourne (Michael Fassbender) and spirited Isabel (Alicia Vikander) live together in married bliss on a remote, rugged island off the coast of Australia. But their windswept world is turned upside down when Isabel learns that she's unable to bear a child. One day, a drifting lifeboat washes ashore with a crying baby in it. The dilemma the couple now faces echoes far beyond the island, engulfing and irrevocably impacting their world

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: Casey, a young American backpacker in Germany, falls in love with Juliette, a fellow American traveling through Europe. She is diagnosed with a fatal disease, and Casey decides to steal from German gangster Hagen, in order to pay for the medical treatment which could save Juliette's life. Casey's heist doesn't go as planned and Hagen catches him. He manages to escape Hagen's men, steal one of Hagen's cars, and flee. Pursued across Germany, he races to save his own life and get to Juliette before Hagen's men get to her first

Pursued by a dogged Internal Affairs investigator (Michelle Monaghan) and a sadistic drug kingpin (Scoot McNairy), Vincent must rely on his street smarts and sheer force of will as he tries to rescue his child over the course of a single night. Directed by Baran bo Odar

As the brothers plot one final heist, a showdown looms at the crossroads where the last honest law man and a pair of brothers with nothing to live for except family collide
