programme.desc: Legendary Marine sniper Tom Beckett (Tom Berenger) has an impressive 74 confirmed kills, and is sent to the hostile jungles of Central America to eliminate a dangerous rebel leader and his Colombian drug lord financier. As his spotter, the Pentagon chooses Richard Miller (Billy Zane), a silver-medal marksman aiming for a Washington promotion. Inexperienced and out of his element, Miller is unprepared for anything he'll encounter in the jungle(n)

programme.title: Sniper 2
programme.desc: Sergeant Thomas Beckett is teamed up with a death row inmate named B.J. Cole on a suicide mission to the Balkans. Their target is a rogue general accused of running a stealth operation of hit-and-run ethnic cleansing missions in an area known as No Man's Land. However, Beckett discovers that the government is using him as a pawn in a bigger mission, and decides to do something about it. Tom Berenger and Bokeem Woodbine star(n)

programme.title: Sniper 3
programme.desc: Master Gunnery Sergeant Thomas Beckett (Tom Berenger) is the US Marine Corps' most decorated sniper. Having taken out warlords, drug czars and assassins, he has over seventy confirmed kills in his long and illustrious career. Beckett is hired by NSA officials William Avery (Denis Arndt) and Richard Addis (William Duffy) to perform a covert operation and eliminate a suspected terrorist. The assignment is intensified when the real purpose of the mission turns out to be something other than what Beckett is told(n)

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: By day, American in Paris Maureen (Kristen Stewart) works as a personal shopper, motor-biking around the city buying up deluxe couture for a celebrity client. By night, she attempts to channel the spirits of the dead, hoping to make contact with her recently deceased twin brother. When Maureen begins receiving a series of chilling, increasingly sinister text messages, it seems she may have made contact - but she doesn't know with whom(n)

programme.title: Madea's Family Reunion
programme.desc: Writer, director and star Tyler Perry returns to his signature role in this comedy-drama that finds family matriarch Madea juggling several romantic crises involving her nieces' relationships as well as the funeral of an older sister - all on the weekend that her entire clan is gathering for a reunion. Cicely Tyson, Blair Underwood, Lynn Whitfield and Maya Angelou costar(n)

programme.title: Splash
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars as a man now reunited with the mermaid who saved him from drowning as a boy. He falls in love with her not knowing who or what she is(n)

programme.title: #ThatsHarassment
programme.desc: This film is a series of six short films, written and directed by Sigal Avin. It depicts six different cases of sexual harassment in the work place, all based on real events. In ‘The Boss,’ a young employee gets a ride home. In ‘The Photographer,’ a young model is put in an uncomfortable position. In ‘The Doctor,’ a patient is taken advantage of. In ‘The Actor,’ a costume dresser is taken aback. In ‘The Politician,’ a journalist is asked to take a break from an interview. In ‘The Co-worker,’ a bartender trains the new girl(n)

programme.title: Miracle
programme.desc: Kurt Russell plays determined United States ice hockey coach Herb Brooks, who has the impossible dream of beating the seemingly unbeatable Soviet Union the 1980 Winter Olympics. Starting with a handpicked group of 26 undisciplined kids, Brooks coaches them to play like they've never played before, and turns 20 of them into a team that believes they could achieve the unachievable. Based on the true story(n)

programme.title: The Great Debaters
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars in and directs this inspiring drama about a college professor who challenges the entrenched racism and prejudice of the 1930's by assembling and training a first-class African-American debate team, a talented group that makes its way to a national championship against Harvard University. Forest Whitaker, Jurnee Smollett and Nate Parker costar in this fact-based, critically acclaimed film(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's The Family That Preys
programme.desc: Alfre Woodard and Kathy Bates are the matriarchs of two completely different families, one white, the other black; one rich, the other working class, who become best friends despite the odds against them in this comedy-drama costarring Sanaa Lathan(n)

programme.title: Daddy Day Care
programme.desc: Two fathers (Eddie Murphy and Jeff Garlin) join the ranks of the unemployed. They are forced to take their sons out of the exclusive Chapman Academy and become stay-at-home fathers. With no job possibilities on the horizon, the two dads decide to open their own day care facility, which boasts some fairly unconventional methods of tending the kids. As their day care starts to catch on, it launches them into a competition with Chapman Academy's tough-as-nails director (Anjelica Huston) for the hearts and minds of the children(n)

programme.title: The Descent
programme.desc: Seeking to exorcise the demons of a tragedy that still haunts her, an outdoorsy woman (Shauna Macdonald) and her five best friends spend a weekend spelunking in the Appalachian Mountains - but a wrong turn down a remote cave system lands them at the doorstep of strange, flesh-craving creatures. Natalie Mendoza, Alex Reid, Saskia Mulder, Nora-Jane Noone, MyAnna Buring, Oliver Milburn and Molly Kayll costar in the sophomore film of writer-director Neil Marshall

programme.title: The Mist
programme.desc: A horrifying short story by Stephen King becomes this engrossing chiller about the survivors of a strange, mutating mist that invades a small town and brings with it unspeakable monsters. Thomas Jane, Laurie Holden, Andre Braugher, Marcia Gay Harden and William Sadler star in this film directed by Frank Darabont ("The Shawshank Redemption")

programme.title: The Eyes
programme.desc: When six strangers with unspeakable pasts wake up imprisoned in an abandoned warehouse, they discover they are being forced to participate in an evil experiment. Five of them must die, only one can live and they have two hours to decide amongst themselves who survives. The clock is ticking and if they don't decide, they will all die

programme.title: Nocturne
programme.desc: Isaac intends to throw the greatest graduation party of all time while his parents are out of town. Instead, he is disappointed to find that only a handful of his friends show up. Intent on making the best of the night, the group performs a séance to learn more about the futures that lie before them. The seemingly innocent game goes terribly wrong and they soon find that they are not alone in the house. Something has joined the party, and it wants them dead

programme.title: The Funhouse Massacre
programme.desc: On Halloween night, a group of notorious serial killers escape from an asylum and terrorize the patrons of a funhouse carnival - leaving only a rag-tag bunch of kids, a clueless deputy and a local sheriff to stop the carnage

programme.title: Blood Sand
programme.desc: Sci-fi horror that centers around a group of hung over twenty-somethings who rise after a raging all-night graduation party to find the beach has turned into a carnivorous force that will devour anything with a heartbeat

programme.title: King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table
programme.desc: Facing defeat, Merlin banishes the evil enchantress Morgana and her son to the ends of universe. Vowing revenge, Morgana and her son return to Earth, hell-bent on destroying every last descendant of King Arthur and his Knights

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Teenager Max McGrath moves back to Copper Canyon, the town where his scientist father died under mysterious circumstances. Adjusting to a new school is not easy for Max, and it becomes even more complicated when his body starts to generate strange energy flare-ups that he can't control. This unpredictable power surge grows too intense for Max to handle and he is forced to distance himself from those around him. On the brink of fatal combustion, Max is rescued by Steel, an extraterrestrial who has been secretly monitoring his progress

programme.title: Starman
programme.desc: An alien (Jeff Bridges) observing life on Earth becomes stranded near the Wisconsin farmhouse of recently widowed Jenny Hayden (Karen Allen). The alien, otherwise known as Starman, clones the human form of Scott Hayden, Jenny's deceased husband. Due to be picked up by his mother ship in three days at Meteor Crater, Arizona, Starman is in dire need of human assistance. Jenny becomes an unwilling participant in a trip that becomes a dangerous flight across the country as the two are pursued by the U.S. Army

programme.title: Unnatural
programme.desc: James Remar and Sherilyn Fenn star in this horror flick about a morally ambiguous corporation that experiments with genetic modification, resulting in the creation of a man-hunting creature who escapes and terrorizes an unsuspecting community of cabin dwellers in a horrifying game of cat and mouse

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
programme.desc: Academy Award nominee Johnny Depp stars as a man who returns to London after escaping from 15 years of false imprisonment in Australia, and adopts the guise of Sweeny Todd. He vows to kill the evil Judge Turpin (Alan Rickman) and his henchman Beadle Bamford (Timothy Spall), who shipped him off to the other side of the world in order to steal his wife and daughter from him. Sweeney has only revenge on his mind, and sets himself up in his old barber shop above Mrs. Lovett's pie store. Directed by Tim Burton

programme.title: Cell
programme.desc: At the Boston airport, Clay (John Cusack) witnesses a scene of chaotic mayhem when an electronic signal turns hundreds of cell phone users into rabid killers. Desperate to find his estranged wife and son, Clay teams with a train driver (Samuel L. Jackson) to battle the horde of murderous phoners as the city descends into madness

programme.title: The Babadook
programme.desc: Six years after the violent death of her husband, Amelia (Essie Davis) is at a loss. She struggles to discipline her out-of-control son, Samuel (Noah Wiseman), who she finds impossible to love. Samuel's dreams are plagued by a monster he believes is coming to kill them both. When a disturbing storybook turns up at their house, Samuel is convinced that the Babadook is the creature he's been dreaming about. His hallucinations spiral out of control, he becomes more unpredictable and violent

programme.title: The Harvest
programme.desc: A couple who keeps their sick son in a secluded environment find their controlled lives challenged by a young girl who moves in next door. The perfect family is not who they appear to be. Starring Michael Shannon

programme.title: Starman
programme.desc: An alien (Jeff Bridges) observing life on Earth becomes stranded near the Wisconsin farmhouse of recently widowed Jenny Hayden (Karen Allen). The alien, otherwise known as Starman, clones the human form of Scott Hayden, Jenny's deceased husband. Due to be picked up by his mother ship in three days at Meteor Crater, Arizona, Starman is in dire need of human assistance. Jenny becomes an unwilling participant in a trip that becomes a dangerous flight across the country as the two are pursued by the U.S. Army

programme.title: Open Water
programme.desc: Loosely inspired by a shocking true story, this chilling psychological horror story follows a bickering couple on vacation in the Caribbean who are accidentally abandoned during a diving expedition and forced to fend for themselves in the ocean as they are surrounded by sharks - while the tour operators back at the harbor take 24 hours to realize that they have left a pair of customers stranded. Blanchard Ryan and Daniel Travis star in this gripping independent hit from writer/director Chris Kentis

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: By day, American in Paris Maureen (Kristen Stewart) works as a personal shopper, motor-biking around the city buying up deluxe couture for a celebrity client. By night, she attempts to channel the spirits of the dead, hoping to make contact with her recently deceased twin brother. When Maureen begins receiving a series of chilling, increasingly sinister text messages, it seems she may have made contact - but she doesn't know with whom

programme.title: Hardcore Henry
programme.desc: In the world's first action-adventure film shot entirely from a first person perspective, a resurrected cyborg named Henry must fight through the streets of Moscow in pursuit of his kidnapped wife

programme.title: I Survived a Zombie Holocaust
programme.desc: Fresh from film school, an enthusiastic young runner starts work on a low budget zombie movie only to run into the first day from hell as a mystery illness starts to turn the extras on set into the bona fide undead

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Teenager Max McGrath moves back to Copper Canyon, the town where his scientist father died under mysterious circumstances. Adjusting to a new school is not easy for Max, and it becomes even more complicated when his body starts to generate strange energy flare-ups that he can't control. This unpredictable power surge grows too intense for Max to handle and he is forced to distance himself from those around him. On the brink of fatal combustion, Max is rescued by Steel, an extraterrestrial who has been secretly monitoring his progress

programme.title: Cody the Robosapien
programme.desc: When a 12-year-old boy discovers a broken robot, he finds a zany and powerful new best friend who can change his life for the better but when the evil corporation that funded the robot's creation intervenes, the pair must team up to save their family

programme.title: Dudes & Dragons
programme.desc: When a powerful wizard is jilted by a princess, he vows to rid the land of love and commands a fire breathing dragon to destroy any sign of affection seen throughout the kingdom but as the death toll rises, a brave and arrogant warrior and his estranged brother answer the princess’ call to fight the curse

programme.title: Battlefield Earth
programme.desc: It's the year 3000 and man is an endangered species. After enslavement and near extermination by an alien race, humanity begins to fight back. John Travolta stars as Terl, the security chief of Earth. Also starring Forrest Whitaker

programme.title: Extraterrestrial
programme.desc: A group's getaway into the woods dissolves into a full-throttle fight for their lives when unwelcome aliens invade

programme.title: Superhero Movie
programme.desc: This rib-tickling spoof of comic book adventures stars Drake Bell as a teenager who is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly and attains super powers. Leslie Nielsen and Tracy Morgan costar in this hilarious send-up

programme.title: Capsule
programme.desc: In 1959, during the height of the Cold War, an experienced fighter pilot finds himself trapped in a malfunctioning spacecraft and must fight to survive in order to make it home to Earth

programme.title: Vampire in Brooklyn
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy stars as the vampire Maximillian, the most undead dude in the 'hood. He also plays a paunchy preacher and a fast talking thug. Angela Basset plays the cop whose world is rocked by Maximillian's attempts to make her his mate for eternity. Kadeem Hardison plays the haplessly decaying vampire's sidekick who is forever losing things. Directed by Wes Craven

programme.title: Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: An engaged couple goes away with their friends to a remote cabin to celebrate their upcoming wedding but the weekend takes a horrifying turn when dark secrets and forbidden desires are revealed and what started as a celebration quickly descends into a bloody nightmare

programme.title: Superhero Movie
programme.desc: This rib-tickling spoof of comic book adventures stars Drake Bell as a teenager who is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly and attains super powers. Leslie Nielsen and Tracy Morgan costar in this hilarious send-up(n)

programme.title: Battlefield Earth
programme.desc: It's the year 3000 and man is an endangered species. After enslavement and near extermination by an alien race, humanity begins to fight back. John Travolta stars as Terl, the security chief of Earth. Also starring Forrest Whitaker(n)

programme.title: Vampire in Brooklyn
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy stars as the vampire Maximillian, the most undead dude in the 'hood. He also plays a paunchy preacher and a fast talking thug. Angela Basset plays the cop whose world is rocked by Maximillian's attempts to make her his mate for eternity. Kadeem Hardison plays the haplessly decaying vampire's sidekick who is forever losing things. Directed by Wes Craven(n)

programme.title: Sex Devil
programme.desc: One hazy night at a Halloween party, Raven (Joanna Angel) gets knocked up by Lucifer AKA the devil (Xander Corvus). 21 years later she tells her daughter Cindy (Leigh Raven) the truth about her father. After the two of them reunite at a local demonic ritual, Cindy is presented with the choice: remain on earth with her mother or train to be the next ruler of Hell! Cindy's voyage through the underworld is filled with whips, chains and debaucherous sex(n)

programme.title: Stake Land
programme.desc: When an epidemic of vampirism strikes and his family is slaughtered, young Martin (Connor Paolo) is taken under the wing of a grizzled, wayward hunter (Nick Damici) whose new prey are the undead. Simply known as Mister, the vampire stalker takes Martin on a journey through the locked-down towns of America's heartland, searching for a better place to call home while taking down any bloodsuckers that cross their path(n)

programme.title: Superhero Movie
programme.desc: This rib-tickling spoof of comic book adventures stars Drake Bell as a teenager who is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly and attains super powers. Leslie Nielsen and Tracy Morgan costar in this hilarious send-up(n)

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people(n)

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare(n)

programme.title: The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus
programme.desc: Doctor Parnassus (Christopher Plummer) is cursed with a dark secret. Thousands of years ago he made a bet with the devil, Mr. Nick (Tom Waits), in which he won immortality. Centuries later, on meeting his one true love, Dr. Parnassus made another deal with the devil, trading his immortality for youth, on condition that when his daughter reaches her 16th birthday, she will become the property of Mr. Nick. His daughter is now rapidly approaching the age milestone and Dr. Parnassus is desperate to protect her from her impending fate(n)

programme.title: The Darkest Hour
programme.desc: Five young people find themselves stranded in Moscow, fighting to survive in the wake of a devastating alien attack in this sci-fi action thriller directed by Chris Gorak. Starring Emile Hirsch and Oliva Thirlby(n)

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: Shaun (Simon Pegg) and his friends are in for a literal night from hell when they meet up at the local pub only to find themselves fighting off hordes of brain-hungry undead. Penelope Wilton, Kate Ashfield, Lucy Davis and Bill Nighy co-star in this zombie-fraught romantic comedy(n)

programme.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
programme.desc: Academy Award nominee Johnny Depp stars as a man who returns to London after escaping from 15 years of false imprisonment in Australia, and adopts the guise of Sweeny Todd. He vows to kill the evil Judge Turpin (Alan Rickman) and his henchman Beadle Bamford (Timothy Spall), who shipped him off to the other side of the world in order to steal his wife and daughter from him. Sweeney has only revenge on his mind, and sets himself up in his old barber shop above Mrs. Lovett's pie store. Directed by Tim Burton(n)

programme.title: Devil's Pass
programme.desc: Nine Russian hikers venture into a remote area of the Ural Mountains. Two weeks later, all nine are found dead. Five ambitious American college students are issued a grant to return to the site of the original events in the belief that they can uncover and document the truth of what happened. Their trek through the mountains, retracing the steps of that ill-fated journey, is plagued by strange and increasingly terrifying phenomena, all of which suggest that they are not alone. The forces behind the Dyatlov Pass Incident are waiting for them(n)

programme.title: Rabid
programme.desc: After a young woman has a motorcycle accident that leads to experimental surgery to save her life, she develops a taste for blood that spurs a city-wide zombie epidemic(n)

programme.title: Free State of Jones
programme.desc: A defiant Southern farmer, Newt Knight, leads an armed uprising of small farmers and local slaves that causes a county in Mississippi to secede from the Confederacy and create a free state in this epic action-drama set during the Civil War. Starring Oscar® winner Matthew McConaughey

programme.title: Sniper
programme.desc: Legendary Marine sniper Tom Beckett (Tom Berenger) has an impressive 74 confirmed kills, and is sent to the hostile jungles of Central America to eliminate a dangerous rebel leader and his Colombian drug lord financier. As his spotter, the Pentagon chooses Richard Miller (Billy Zane), a silver-medal marksman aiming for a Washington promotion. Inexperienced and out of his element, Miller is unprepared for anything he'll encounter in the jungle

programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous (2008)
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars in this remake of the action classic about a lethal assassin who travels to Bangkok to perform a quartet of hits but falls in love with a beautiful, deaf pharmacist, and takes a young hustler under his wing as a protege. Charlie Yeung costars in this stylish thriller

programme.title: My Best Friend's Girl
programme.desc: A vulgar womanizer offers himself to jilted men as a "rebound guy" who will send their ex-lovers running back into their arms, but meets his match in the brassy former girlfriend of his best buddy. Dane Cook, Kate Hudson and Jason Biggs star in this romantic comedy

programme.title: As I AM: The Life and Times of DJ AM
programme.desc: Documentary about the late, great mash-up pioneer DJ AM that charts his meteoric rise, his long-running struggle with addiction, his tabloid romances and his untimely death. Includes live sets, plus interviews with Jon Favreau, Mark Ronson, Mix Master Mike, Samantha Ronson and many others

programme.title: Mercy (2010)
programme.desc: A writer (Scott Caan) of highly sentimental love stories is secretly a womanizing cynic who has never actually experienced love, until he meets the beautiful and shockingly straightforward critic Mercy (Wendy Glenn), who is not fooled by his phony mawkishness. Erika Christensen costars in this romantic drama

programme.title: Madea's Family Reunion
programme.desc: Writer, director and star Tyler Perry returns to his signature role in this comedy-drama that finds family matriarch Madea juggling several romantic crises involving her nieces' relationships as well as the funeral of an older sister - all on the weekend that her entire clan is gathering for a reunion. Cicely Tyson, Blair Underwood, Lynn Whitfield and Maya Angelou costar

programme.title: George Michael: Freedom
programme.desc: Documentary covering the span of his career, but concentrating on the formative period in the late Grammy Award winner's life, leading up to and following the making of his acclaimed album 'Listen Without Prejudice Vol. 1' and the subsequent High Court battle with his record label that followed, while also becoming poignantly personal about the death of his late partner and first love, Anselmo Feleppa. Filmed before Michael's untimely passing, the film is narrated by him, who was heavily involved in the making of it

programme.title: The Free World
programme.desc: After spending two decades in prison for a crime he didn't commit, Mo (Boyd Holbrook) struggles to put his past behind him and readjust to a new life. Doris (Elisabeth Moss) is trapped in another sort of prison: an abusive marriage. When a dramatic encounter brings them together, Mo soon finds himself risking everything—including being locked up once again for someone else's crime—to protect the fragile Doris. Academy Award® winner Octavia Spencer and Sung Kang costar

programme.title: Bad Santa
programme.desc: Criminals Willie (Tony Cox) and Marcus (Billy Bob Thornton) disguise themselves as Santa Claus and his elf and travel across the country to major malls, using the good will people have toward Santa to rob the stores blind. However, Willie can't stand kids and it's all he can do to keep himself from getting fired while on the job. Their plan progresses beautifully until the two meet an introverted 8-year-old boy who thinks Willie is the real Santa Claus, and strikes real sympathy in him
Returning to his hometown, US Marine Nelson Sanchez finds himself trapped by the violent past he had tried to escape

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Over-worked, over-committed and exhausted, Amy joins forces with two other stressed moms on a quest to liberate themselves from conventional responsibilities - going on a long overdue binge of freedom and fun that puts them on a collision course with the head of the PTA and her clique of perfect moms

programme.title: Skateboarding's First Wave
programme.desc: Documentary from Academy Award® nominee Don Burgess exploring the origins of skateboarding culture, through the lens of the 1965 Palisades Skateboard Team, who reinvented a childhood hobby into a sport, bringing it to the vanguard of popular culture. Features interviews with the team members reflecting on how the sport has changed, 50 years later

programme.title: Southland Tales
programme.desc: On July 4, 2008, Los Angeles stands on the brink of social, economic and environmental disaster. Boxer Santaros is an action star stricken with amnesia. His life intertwines with Krysta Now, an adult film star developing her own reality television project, and David Clark, a Hermosa Beach police officer who holds the key to a vast conspiracy

programme.title: Madea's Family Reunion
programme.desc: Writer, director and star Tyler Perry returns to his signature role in this comedy-drama that finds family matriarch Madea juggling several romantic crises involving her nieces' relationships as well as the funeral of an older sister - all on the weekend that her entire clan is gathering for a reunion. Cicely Tyson, Blair Underwood, Lynn Whitfield and Maya Angelou costar

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Over-worked, over-committed and exhausted, Amy joins forces with two other stressed moms on a quest to liberate themselves from conventional responsibilities - going on a long overdue binge of freedom and fun that puts them on a collision course with the head of the PTA and her clique of perfect moms

programme.title: Zack and Miri Make a Porno
programme.desc: As a way to pay off their mounting debts, lifelong pals Zack (Seth Rogen) and Miri (Elizabeth Banks) decide to write, direct and star in a pornographic movie, which they believe to be a sure moneymaker. But they may end up as the first couple in adult cinematic history that discovers long-hidden feelings for each other while doing so. Craig Robinson costars in this romantic sex comedy

programme.title: Fight Valley
programme.desc: When a young woman is found dead after getting involved in an underground fighting ring, her sister begins training under a respected ex-fighter to bring justice to the killer

programme.title: 3 Strikes
programme.desc: After being paroled, young ex-con Rob Douglas (Brian Hooks) will do anything to avoid a third and final brush with the law, but trouble's got a way of tracking him down. Faizon Love, E-40, David Alan Grier and N'Bushe Wright costar in this raunchy comedy from the creator of "Friday."

programme.title: Al Madrigal: Shrimpin' Ain't Easy
programme.desc: Former 'Daily Show with Jon Stewart' correspondent Al Madrigal applies his comedic insight to relatable topics like cilantro politics, anger management, and an unbelievable tale of seafood revenge in this stand-up comedy special

programme.title: Skateboarding's First Wave
programme.desc: Documentary from Academy Award® nominee Don Burgess exploring the origins of skateboarding culture, through the lens of the 1965 Palisades Skateboard Team, who reinvented a childhood hobby into a sport, bringing it to the vanguard of popular culture. Features interviews with the team members reflecting on how the sport has changed, 50 years later

programme.title: Black Sabbath - The End of The End
programme.desc: Chronicles the final tour from Black Sabbath. On February 4th, 2017, Black Sabbath takes the stage in Birmingham, the city where it all began, to play the 81st and final gig of the tour and bring down the curtain on a career that spanned almost half a century. The cameras are taken into the heart of the action, getting up close and personal with the band as they perform genre-defining hits, from 'Iron Man' to 'Paranoid' to 'War Pigs', among others. The special also features a studio performance of some of their songs not played on the tour

programme.title: A Rising Tide
programme.desc: After the destruction of his family's restaurant during Hurricane Sandy, a young chef (Hunter Parrish) must grow up quickly, taking the biggest risks of his life both in business and love. Life starts to go his way when he meets a wealthy patron (Tim Daly) and has a chance encounter with Sarah (Ashley Hinshaw). As a chain of unexpected events unfolds for all of them, as they discover the only way to achieve their dreams may be to acknowledge what they owe to others - and let destiny take its course

programme.title: Bowfinger
programme.desc: Forty-nine-year-old Bobby Bowfinger is the president of a Hollywood-based production company, Bowfinger International Pictures. The company has yet to produce a film, Bobby's personal net worth is virtually zero and the company only has $2,184 to its name. Bobby believes his fortunes will change when his accountant, Afrim, changes hats and writes a science-fiction alien invasion screenplay that Bobby thinks all studios will clamor for. He has a small stable of followers who support his vision in being part of this movie

programme.title: Hardball
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves stars in this sports comedy as a Chicago gambler who gets some help with his massive debts in exchange for coaching an underprivileged Little League team. At first he only takes the job out of obligation, but his team's heart and their attractive teacher Miss Wilkes (Diane Lane) soon have him angling for a championship. D.B. Sweeney costars

programme.title: Devil's Pass
programme.desc: Nine Russian hikers venture into a remote area of the Ural Mountains. Two weeks later, all nine are found dead. Five ambitious American college students are issued a grant to return to the site of the original events in the belief that they can uncover and document the truth of what happened. Their trek through the mountains, retracing the steps of that ill-fated journey, is plagued by strange and increasingly terrifying phenomena, all of which suggest that they are not alone. The forces behind the Dyatlov Pass Incident are waiting for them

programme.title: Dolan's Cadillac
programme.desc: Robinson (Wes Bentley) is a law-abiding schoolteacher until his wife Elizabeth unexpectedly witnesses a murder. The killer is Jimmy Dolan (Christian Slater), Las Vegas' most ruthless and untouchable mob boss. Elizabeth agrees to testify, and faces deadly consequences. Devastated by her death, Robinson tries everything to bring Dolan to justice. Without hard evidence however, Dolan remains free. Haunted by the ghost of wife, Robinson transforms himself into a vengeance-obsessed machine, pushing himself beyond the breaking point

programme.title: Bowfinger
programme.desc: Forty-nine-year-old Bobby Bowfinger is the president of a Hollywood-based production company, Bowfinger International Pictures. The company has yet to produce a film, Bobby's personal net worth is virtually zero and the company only has $2,184 to its name. Bobby believes his fortunes will change when his accountant, Afrim, changes hats and writes a science-fiction alien invasion screenplay that Bobby thinks all studios will clamor for. He has a small stable of followers who support his vision in being part of this movie

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: Shaun (Simon Pegg) and his friends are in for a literal night from hell when they meet up at the local pub only to find themselves fighting off hordes of brain-hungry undead. Penelope Wilton, Kate Ashfield, Lucy Davis and Bill Nighy co-star in this zombie-fraught romantic comedy

programme.title: Hardball
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves stars in this sports comedy as a Chicago gambler who gets some help with his massive debts in exchange for coaching an underprivileged Little League team. At first he only takes the job out of obligation, but his team's heart and their attractive teacher Miss Wilkes (Diane Lane) soon have him angling for a championship. D.B. Sweeney costars(n)

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman, Matthew Broderick and Christopher Walken star in this satirical remake of the classic thriller about a planned community where the picture-perfect women are a little too eerily flawless. Glenn Close, Bette Midler, Jon Lovitz and Roger Bart costar in this wickedly acerbic comedy from writer Paul Rudnick ("Addams Family Values," "In & Out")(n)

programme.title: My First Mister
programme.desc: Jennifer (Leelee Sobieski) is a 17-year-old Goth with multiple face-piercings and a fondness for graveyards. Randall (Albert Brooks) is a middle-aged salesman with an obsessively tidy life and a fear of anything new. Desperate to escape her world, Jennifer impulsively applies for a job at Randall's conservative clothing store. Soon, an unlikely friendship blooms. But even as Randall attempts to show Jennifer the possibilities of her own future, Jennifer discovers the extraordinary secret haunting Randall's past(n)

programme.title: Sniper: Legacy
programme.desc: A rogue gunman is assassinating high-ranking military officers one by one. When Gunnery Sgt. Brandon Beckett (Chad Michael Collins) is informed his father, legendary shooter Thomas Beckett (Tom Berenger), has been killed, Brandon springs into action to take out the perpetrator. But when his father rescues him from an ambush, Brandon realizes he's a pawn being played by his superiors to draw out the killer. It's up to the two men, to bring an end to the carnage(n)

programme.title: American Jihad
programme.desc: Documentary probe into the phenomenon of home-grown Jihadism, analyzing the strategic outreach and tactics employed by terrorists in order to reach susceptible members of society and what can be done to prevent it. Featuring intimate stories from former Jihadists radicalized to commit violent acts of terrorism and their families and communities caught in the crosshairs(n)

programme.title: The Dog Lover
programme.desc: Sara Gold is a young girl on a quest to save man's best friend. When she goes undercover to take down a dog breeder suspected of wrongdoing, she quickly finds out she might be on the wrong side of right. Sara must make a decision: to continue and follow the orders of her organization, United Animal Protection Agency, or trust her instincts and the boy she's fallen in love with(n)

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer(n)

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents(n)

programme.title: BRAND: A Second Coming
programme.desc: Documentary charting controversial comedian Russell Brand's journey from being a troubled youth in Essex to a Hollywood star, hooked on drugs, sex and fame until his unexpected evolution into a political activist(n)

programme.title: Meet the Hitlers
programme.desc: A documentary that examines the relationship between names and identity, by exploring the lives of people who are linked by the name Hitler. This character-driven story offers an intimate portrait of its subjects whose reactions to their name span the spectrum of human experience, from tragedy to comedy, and heartbreak to hope(n)

programme.title: Spring Broke
programme.desc: Documentary charting the raucous history of the infamous spring vacation revelries in Daytona, which started in the early 60s, and by the 1980s led to the arrival of tens of thousands of college students, lured by lust, booze, fun in the sun and eventually, the hope to make it onto MTV(n)

programme.title: Tough Guys
programme.desc: In 1979, more than a decade before the Ultimate Fighting Championship, Bill Viola and Frank Caliguri dream up a contest pitting bar big mouths against wrestlers, martial artists, boxers and brawlers, and bill it as a new no-holds-barred type of competitive fighting. When the fights succeed beyond their wildest expectations, they're swept up in a chain of events that end in the first mixed-martial arts ban in the nation. The film chronicles the inception of Caliguri and Viola's first bouts and the colorful cast of fighters who made them a hit(n)

programme.title: The 4th
programme.desc: Jamie is a down-on-his-luck illustrator who's behind on rent and tries to throw a cookout while his overbearing roommate is out of town on the 4th of July. He decides to borrow his roommate's bike for a quick trip to buy lighter fluid, but his entire day and life quickly go up in smoke. After an incident with a road-rager, Jamie finds himself far from home and trapped in a series of awkward and infuriating situations with strangers(n)

programme.title: Sniper: Reloaded
programme.desc: US Marine Sergeant Brandon Beckett, son of legendary Marine sniper Thomas Beckett is stationed in Zimbala, Africa, on a peace keeping mission working closely with the UN. German UN base commander, Hans Jaeger, sends Brandon and his squad into the neighboring war ravaged Democratic Republic of the Congo to extricate the last remaining plantation owner, Belgian Jean Van Brunt. On the mission, however, Brandon and his squad are met with fierce enemy fire from a hostile sniper(n)

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: A mathematical genius, John Forbes Nash Jr, makes an astonishing discovery early in his career and stands on the brink of international acclaim. But he soon finds himself on a harrowing journey of self-discovery. Russell Crowe stars

programme.title: Inside Man
programme.desc: Detective Frazier (Academy Award winner Denzel Washington) is a tough cop who matches wits with a clever bank robber named Dalton (Academy Award nominee Clive Owen). As the dangerous cat-and-mouse game unfolds, a wild card emerges: Madaline (Academy Award winner Jodie Foster), a power broker with a hidden agenda. Directed by Spike Lee

programme.title: The Great Debaters
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars in and directs this inspiring drama about a college professor who challenges the entrenched racism and prejudice of the 1930's by assembling and training a first-class African-American debate team, a talented group that makes its way to a national championship against Harvard University. Forest Whitaker, Jurnee Smollett and Nate Parker costar in this fact-based, critically acclaimed film

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Having done his best to keep Buddy buried in his subconscious, the portly Professor Sherman Klump (Eddie Murphy) is horrified to find him resurfacing in untimely outbursts, and threatening his marriage plans to colleague Denise Gains (Janet Jackson). Sherman decides to rid himself of his lecherous alter-ego once and for all, but Buddy emerges into his world and lays claim to the professor's youth serum. Buddy heads to Sherman's family home for the drug, but he'll have to deal with the entire Klump family first

programme.title: Madea's Family Reunion
programme.desc: Writer, director and star Tyler Perry returns to his signature role in this comedy-drama that finds family matriarch Madea juggling several romantic crises involving her nieces' relationships as well as the funeral of an older sister - all on the weekend that her entire clan is gathering for a reunion. Cicely Tyson, Blair Underwood, Lynn Whitfield and Maya Angelou costar

programme.title: Rolling Stones: Sweet Summer Sun - Hyde Park Live
programme.desc: The biggest live show of the year: The Rolling Stones return to Hyde Park, London almost 44 years to the day after their legendary free concert in July 1969. Featuring their greatest hits across a career spanning 50 years, plus a special appearance by former Stones guitarist Mick Taylor. Highlights include 'Gimme Shelter,' 'Jumpin' Jack Flash,' 'You Can't Always Get What You Want' and '(I Can't Get No) Satisfaction.'

programme.title: Bowfinger
programme.desc: Forty-nine-year-old Bobby Bowfinger is the president of a Hollywood-based production company, Bowfinger International Pictures. The company has yet to produce a film, Bobby's personal net worth is virtually zero and the company only has $2,184 to its name. Bobby believes his fortunes will change when his accountant, Afrim, changes hats and writes a science-fiction alien invasion screenplay that Bobby thinks all studios will clamor for. He has a small stable of followers who support his vision in being part of this movie

programme.title: Daddy Day Care
programme.desc: Two fathers (Eddie Murphy and Jeff Garlin) join the ranks of the unemployed. They are forced to take their sons out of the exclusive Chapman Academy and become stay-at-home fathers. With no job possibilities on the horizon, the two dads decide to open their own day care facility, which boasts some fairly unconventional methods of tending the kids. As their day care starts to catch on, it launches them into a competition with Chapman Academy's tough-as-nails director (Anjelica Huston) for the hearts and minds of the children

programme.title: Tyler Perry's The Family That Preys
programme.desc: Alfre Woodard and Kathy Bates are the matriarchs of two completely different families, one white, the other black; one rich, the other working class, who become best friends despite the odds against them in this comedy-drama costarring Sanaa Lathan

programme.title: Speak
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart is a teenager traumatized into silence after a summer party ends in a police raid that leaves her ostracized by her friends but unable to explain her actions. Elizabeth Perkins, D.B. Sweeney and Steve Zahn costar in this drama based on the award-winning novel by Laurie Halse Anderson

programme.title: Bulletproof
programme.desc: Adam Sandler plays a small-time criminal who must be escorted to L.A. by an undercover cop (Damon Wayans). When their transport plane is shot down, Sandler and Wayans must make it across the country by themselves

programme.title: Across the Line
programme.desc: Mattie is a top ice hockey player tipped to be selected by one of the top teams in the National Hockey League, but his plans are jeopardized by his hustling brother and the corrosive racial tension at his high school

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: Terrence Howard stars in this rousing true-life story of a Philadelphia swim coach in the mid-1970s who faces racism in trying to land a coaching position, and instead transforms a group of trash-talking inner-city teenagers into a championship squad. Bernie Mac, Kimberly Elise and Tom Arnold costar in this inspiring drama

programme.title: Daddy Day Care
programme.desc: Two fathers (Eddie Murphy and Jeff Garlin) join the ranks of the unemployed. They are forced to take their sons out of the exclusive Chapman Academy and become stay-at-home fathers. With no job possibilities on the horizon, the two dads decide to open their own day care facility, which boasts some fairly unconventional methods of tending the kids. As their day care starts to catch on, it launches them into a competition with Chapman Academy's tough-as-nails director (Anjelica Huston) for the hearts and minds of the children

programme.title: Tyler Perry's The Family That Preys
programme.desc: Alfre Woodard and Kathy Bates are the matriarchs of two completely different families, one white, the other black; one rich, the other working class, who become best friends despite the odds against them in this comedy-drama costarring Sanaa Lathan

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy stars as Professor Sherman Klump, a hugely obese scientist who falls for the lovely Professor Carla Purty (Jada Pinkett Smith). Desperate for her affections, Klump invents a DNA-altering drug that temporarily transforms him into the slender, testosterone-overloaded jerk, Buddy Love. Soon, both egos are competing for dominance and Carla's attention. Dave Chappelle and James Coburn co-star. Murphy also plays the entire Klump family

programme.title: Gary Owen: I Got My Associates
programme.desc: Stand-up comedian Gary Owen shares stories of being married to the daughter of a founding member of the Black Panthers, being the father of young teenagers and, of course, his hillbilly family. Filmed at the Stardome in Hoover, Alabama, the special also includes Gary recounting his time in the military, celebrity weddings and bumping into Lebron James in the bathroom

programme.title: Bad Ass
programme.desc: A shunned Vietnam veteran who becomes a local hero after saving a man from attackers on a city bus decides to take action when his best friend is murdered and the police show little interest in solving the crime

programme.title: Cold Mountain
programme.desc: At the dawn of the Civil War, the men of Cold Mountain, North Carolina, rush to join the Confederate army. Ada (Nicole Kidman) has vowed to wait for Inman (Jude Law), but as the war drags on and letters go unanswered, she must find the will to survive while desperately struggling to hold onto her family's farm. Inman's long journey home takes him through the crumbling confederacy, as he meets people of all walks of life who both aid and hinder his mission

programme.title: Away From Her
programme.desc: A lovingly devoted couple feel their unshakable longtime bond begin to unravel thanks to the ravages of Alzheimer's Disease in this remarkable tour-de-force of acting and powerfully emotional writing from first-time director Sarah Polley. Gordon Pinsent, Julie Christie and Olympia Dukakis star

programme.title: Nemr: No Bombing in Beirut
programme.desc: In this special filmed in both Lebanon and America, Nemr puts together an hour of uproarious comedy capturing thousands of people from the Middle East and America laughing at the same jokes, told by the same man. From his childhood in America, to his later years in Lebanon, Nemr recounts his life and touches on childhood, family, relationships, religion, war and the power of perspective

programme.title: Last Night
programme.desc: Michael and Joanna Reed (Sam Worthington and Keira Knightley) seem to have it all. Young, attractive and successful, they're a married couple who've lucked into spiritual and material well-being, sharing a comfortable life in their trendy Manhattan apartment. But when they attend one of Michael's work parties, Joanna witnesses a suspicious moment between her husband and his beautiful new co-worker, Laura (Eva Mendes). Joanna can't be sure what she did or didn't see - but it sows a powerful seed of doubt

programme.title: 25th Hour
programme.desc: In 24 short hours Monty (Edward Norton) goes to prison for seven years. Once a king of Manhattan, Monty is about to say good-bye to the life he knew. On his last day on the outside, Monty tries to reconnect with his father (Brian Cox) and gets together with his two old friends, Jacob (Philip Seymour Hoffman) and Slaughtery (Barry Pepper). There's also his girlfriend, Naturelle (Rosario Dawson), who may or may not have been the one who tipped off the cops

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta

programme.title: The Girl On The Train
programme.desc: Rachel, who is devastated by her recent divorce, spends her daily commute fantasizing about the seemingly perfect couple who live in a house that her train passes every day. One morning she sees something shocking happen there and becomes entangled in the mystery that unfolds. Emily Blunt, Lisa Kudrow, Justin Theroux and Allison Janney star

programme.title: Chuck
programme.desc: Before Chuck Wepner (Liev Schreiber) goes fifteen rounds with Muhammed Ali, he's a liquor salesman and father with a modest prizefighting career. His life changes overnight when, in 1975, he is chosen to take on The Greatest in a highly publicized title match. It's the beginning of a wild ride through the exhilarating highs and humbling lows of sudden fame. Elisabeth Moss and Naomi Watts costar

programme.title: The Claim
programme.desc: Thomas Hardy's "The Mayor of Casterbridge" gets a frontier makeover with this acclaimed Western about a wealthy Irish immigrant named Dillon (Peter Mullan) whose good fortune in the bucolic California town of Kingdom Come stems from a Faustian bargain he made years ago, a deal that returns to haunt him with the arrival of a railroad surveyor (Wes Bentley) and two mysterious women (Nastassja Kinski and Sarah Polley). Milla Jovovich ("Resident Evil") costars in this film from director Michael Winterbottom ("Welcome to Sarajevo")

programme.title: Con Air
programme.desc: America's most hardened and dangerous criminals are transported via Con Air, a customized armored aircraft equipped with armed guards, hand and leg shackles, and top secret destinations. No one has ever escaped from one of these flying fortresses. A group of violent and deadly cons seizes control of one of the planes, taking the guards hostage and setting a course out of the country. Poe, an inmate who has done his time and is being shipped home to be reunited with his family, proves to be a fly in their ointment(n)

programme.title: 25th Hour
programme.desc: In 24 short hours Monty (Edward Norton) goes to prison for seven years. Once a king of Manhattan, Monty is about to say good-bye to the life he knew. On his last day on the outside, Monty tries to reconnect with his father (Brian Cox) and gets together with his two old friends, Jacob (Philip Seymour Hoffman) and Slaughtery (Barry Pepper). There's also his girlfriend, Naturelle (Rosario Dawson), who may or may not have been the one who tipped off the cops(n)

programme.title: The Free World
programme.desc: After spending two decades in prison for a crime he didn't commit, Mo (Boyd Holbrook) struggles to put his past behind him and readjust to a new life. Doris (Elisabeth Moss) is trapped in another sort of prison: an abusive marriage. When a dramatic encounter brings them together, Mo soon finds himself risking everything—including being locked up once again for someone else's crime—to protect the fragile Doris. Academy Award® winner Octavia Spencer and Sung Kang costar(n)

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: Nadine (Hailee Steinfeld) and Krista (Haley Lu Richardson) are inseparable best friends attempting to navigate high school together, until Nadine's older brother Darian (Blake Jenner) and Krista begin dating. With her view of the world rocked, Nadine is forced to see the people in her life, including her well-meaning but distracted mother (Kyra Sedgwick), and unlikely mentor and History teacher Mr. Bruner (Woody Harrelson), with fresh eyes and new appreciation. She realizes that people - and life - are more complicated than she thought(n)

programme.title: Zack and Miri Make a Porno
programme.desc: As a way to pay off their mounting debts, lifelong pals Zack (Seth Rogen) and Miri (Elizabeth Banks) decide to write, direct and star in a pornographic movie, which they believe to be a sure moneymaker. But they may end up as the first couple in adult cinematic history that discovers long-hidden feelings for each other while doing so. Craig Robinson costars in this romantic sex comedy(n)

programme.title: The Claim
programme.desc: Thomas Hardy's "The Mayor of Casterbridge" gets a frontier makeover with this acclaimed Western about a wealthy Irish immigrant named Dillon (Peter Mullan) whose good fortune in the bucolic California town of Kingdom Come stems from a Faustian bargain he made years ago, a deal that returns to haunt him with the arrival of a railroad surveyor (Wes Bentley) and two mysterious women (Nastassja Kinski and Sarah Polley). Milla Jovovich ("Resident Evil") costars in this film from director Michael Winterbottom ("Welcome to Sarajevo")(n)

programme.title: The Legend of Bagger Vance
programme.desc: Rannulph Junuh (Matt Damon) is a gifted golfer from Savannah, GA, until traumatic experiences during World War I shatter his confidence. In 1931, Adele Invergordon (Charlize Theron), a beautiful heiress, inherits a spectacular golf course. To attract customers, she proposes a high-stakes competition that includes Junuh. It becomes obvious that he's not as good as he once was, and all seems lost until a mysterious gentleman named Bagger Vance (Will Smith) volunteers to serve as Junuh's caddy and coach. Robert Redford directs(n)

programme.title: Cop Land
programme.desc: Freddy Heflin (Sylvester Stallone) is the sheriff of a place everyone calls Cop Land - a small and seemingly peaceful town populated by the big city police officers he's long admired. Yet something ugly is taking place behind the town's peaceful facade and Freddy uncovers a massive, deadly conspiracy among the local residents. He is forced to take action and make a dangerous choice between protecting his idols and upholding the law(n)

programme.title: The Rendezvous
programme.desc: Rachel, a Jewish-American doctor and Jake, an Arab-American government bureaucrat, are trying to solve the mysterious death of Rachel's brother. Racing around the world, they find themselves hunted by a doomsday group. The group believes Rachel and Jake possess an ancient script discovered by Rachel's brother that could bring about the end of days. Caught in the middle of a plot to hasten the end of mankind, Rachel and Jake must solve a murder and save the world(n)

programme.title: Unsportsmanlike Comedy with Rob Gronkowski
programme.desc: Sports and comedy come together in this comedy special hosted by Rob Gronkowski himself and featuring the standup comedy of Juston McKinney, Finesse Mitchell, Jay Larson, John Caparulo and Lenny Clarke(n)

programme.title: Two Weeks
programme.desc: A quartet of siblings gather at the North Carolina home of their dying mother, where squabbling, bickering, and ultimately, emotional healing and grace, are in the offing. Sally Field and Ben Chaplin lead the cast of this ensemble comedy-drama, costarring Julianne Nicholson and Tom Cavanagh(n)

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Julia Roberts and Nicole Kidman star as a tight-knit team of rising investigators torn apart by a brutal murder. Now, thirteen years later, a chance to permanently resolve the case reveals an unspeakable secret(n)

programme.title: Fair Game (2010)
programme.desc: The real-life scandal involving the public exposure of Valerie Plame as an undercover CIA agent by vindictive White House officials determined to punish her husband Joe Wilson for his political views is recounted in this drama starring Naomi Watts, Sean Penn and Sam Shepard(n)

programme.title: The Girl On The Train
programme.desc: Rachel, who is devastated by her recent divorce, spends her daily commute fantasizing about the seemingly perfect couple who live in a house that her train passes every day. One morning she sees something shocking happen there and becomes entangled in the mystery that unfolds. Emily Blunt, Lisa Kudrow, Justin Theroux and Allison Janney star

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: Casey, a young American backpacker in Germany, falls in love with Juliette, a fellow American traveling through Europe. She is diagnosed with a fatal disease, and Casey decides to steal from German gangster Hagen, in order to pay for the medical treatment which could save Juliette's life. Casey's heist doesn't go as planned and Hagen catches him. He manages to escape Hagen's men, steal one of Hagen's cars, and flee. Pursued across Germany, he races to save his own life and get to Juliette before Hagen's men get to her first

programme.title: Cold in July
programme.desc: In this southern noir, when a man shoots a burglar in his house, he is hailed as a small-town hero but he soon finds himself fearing for his life when the burglar's ex-con father rolls into town, hell-bent on revenge, and his life becomes embroiled in a dark underworld of corruption and violence that pits him against the most unlikely of foes. Stars Michael C. Hall and Sam Shephard

programme.title: Assault on Precinct 13
programme.desc: Isolated and cut off from the city inside a soon-to-be-closed L.A. police station, a group of police officers and convicts join forces to defend themselves against a gang who wants to kill someone trapped inside the precinct

programme.title: I Hope They Serve Beer In Hell
programme.desc: His debauched lifestyle and outrageous behavior at his friend's bachelor party gets a hedonistic young man uninvited to the wedding, a situation he tries to remedy by reforming his pleasure-driven, egocentric ways in this bawdy comedy starring Jesse Bradford, Matt Czuchry and Geoff Stults

programme.title: Secret in Their Eyes
programme.desc: Chiwetel Ejiofor, Julia Roberts and Nicole Kidman star as a tight-knit team of rising investigators torn apart by a brutal murder. Now, thirteen years later, a chance to permanently resolve the case reveals an unspeakable secret

programme.title: Dream House
programme.desc: Daniel Craig and Academy Award winner Rachel Weisz star as a couple that unknowingly moves into a New England home where several grisly murders were committed, only to become the killer's next target. Academy Award nominee Naomi Watts stars as a neighbor who knew the previous family - a family whose gruesome story could be horrific foreshadowing of the present family's demise. Directed by the Academy Award nominee Jim Sheridan

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Danny Madigan (Austin O'Brien) is a lonely 11-year-old boy who escapes from his bleak reality by glorying in the action adventure movies of his favorite film character, Jack Slater (Arnold Schwarzenegger). When his best friend, Nick the projectionist, gives him a special ticket to the new Slater film, Danny is magically transported into Jack's world, where the good guys always win. Danny becomes his helper as Jack battles a trio of nefarious bad guys, Benedict (Charles Dance), Vivaldi (Anthony Quinn) and The Ripper (Tom Noonan)

programme.title: The Peacemaker
programme.desc: When a train carrying atomic warheads mysteriously crashes in the former Soviet Union, brilliant U.S. nuclear specialist Dr. Julia Kelly (Nicole Kidman) discovers the accident is really part of a diabolical plot to cover up the theft of the weapons. Assigned to help her recover the missing bombs, Special Forces Colonel Thomas Devoe (George Clooney), has a brash, take-no-prisoners style that clashes with Kelly's diplomatic approach. Putting aside their personal differences, the two begin a partnership and try to track down the stolen weapons

programme.title: Alone in Berlin
programme.desc: Otto and Anna Quangel (Brendan Gleeson & Emma Thompson) are a working-class husband and wife doing their best to ride out the war in Berlin in 1940. When their son is killed fighting on the frontlines however, everything changes. They begin pouring their rage and grief into postcards emblazoned with anti-Nazi slogans, risking everything to get their messages of protest across the city. This seemingly small act of subversion rattles the regime, including a police inspector (Daniel Brühl) who will not rest until the culprits have been caught

programme.title: Miracle
programme.desc: Kurt Russell plays determined United States ice hockey coach Herb Brooks, who has the impossible dream of beating the seemingly unbeatable Soviet Union the 1980 Winter Olympics. Starting with a handpicked group of 26 undisciplined kids, Brooks coaches them to play like they've never played before, and turns 20 of them into a team that believes they could achieve the unachievable. Based on the true story

programme.title: U-571
programme.desc: A war thriller inspired by actual events details a secret team of American commandos who masqueraded as Nazis in an attempt to steal a decoding machine from a sinking German U-boat but when their plan goes awry, they find themselves stranded on the enemy sub. Features an all-star cast, including Matthew McConaughey, Harvey Keitel and rocker Jon Bon Jovi

programme.title: Unsportsmanlike Comedy with Rob Gronkowski
programme.desc: Sports and comedy come together in this comedy special hosted by Rob Gronkowski himself and featuring the standup comedy of Juston McKinney, Finesse Mitchell, Jay Larson, John Caparulo and Lenny Clarke

programme.title: Office Christmas Party
programme.desc: When the CEO (Jennifer Aniston) of a company tries to close her hard-partying brother's branch, he (T.J. Miller) and his CTO (Jason Bateman) must rally their co-workers and host an epic office Christmas party in an effort to impress a potential client and close a sale that will save their jobs. Also stars Olivia Munn, Vanessa Bayer, Courtney B. Vance, Rob Corddry and Kate McKinnon

programme.title: ShoBox: The New Generation: 2/2/2018
programme.desc: The critically acclaimed SHOWTIME boxing series, "ShoBox: The New Generation" returns with a stacked slate of top prospects determined to fight for a world title, featuring super middleweight Ronald Ellis (14-0-1, 10 KOs), super lightweight Wellington Romero (12-0-1, 6 KOs) and lightweights Thomas Mattice (10-0, 8 KOs) and Devin Haney (18-0, 12 KOs), all in separate bouts

programme.title: Safety Hysteria
programme.desc: In episode 202, Penn and Teller examine the hucksters that tap into hysteria over personal safety to make big bucks from such products as gas masks, paper toilet seat covers and cell phones - while the average person is four times more likely to be struck by lightning than to be killed violently at school(c)

programme.title: Sniper
programme.desc: Legendary Marine sniper Tom Beckett (Tom Berenger) has an impressive 74 confirmed kills, and is sent to the hostile jungles of Central America to eliminate a dangerous rebel leader and his Colombian drug lord financier. As his spotter, the Pentagon chooses Richard Miller (Billy Zane), a silver-medal marksman aiming for a Washington promotion. Inexperienced and out of his element, Miller is unprepared for anything he'll encounter in the jungle

programme.title: Sniper 2
programme.desc: Sergeant Thomas Beckett is teamed up with a death row inmate named B.J. Cole on a suicide mission to the Balkans. Their target is a rogue general accused of running a stealth operation of hit-and-run ethnic cleansing missions in an area known as No Man's Land. However, Beckett discovers that the government is using him as a pawn in a bigger mission, and decides to do something about it. Tom Berenger and Bokeem Woodbine star

programme.title: Unsportsmanlike Comedy with Rob Gronkowski
programme.desc: Sports and comedy come together in this comedy special hosted by Rob Gronkowski himself and featuring the standup comedy of Juston McKinney, Finesse Mitchell, Jay Larson, John Caparulo and Lenny Clarke

programme.title: The Darkest Hour
programme.desc: Five young people find themselves stranded in Moscow, fighting to survive in the wake of a devastating alien attack in this sci-fi action thriller directed by Chris Gorak. Starring Emile Hirsch and Oliva Thirlby

programme.title: Rush: Time Stand Still
programme.desc: Narrated by Paul Rudd, this documentary chronicles the final major tour of legendary rock band Rush. Featuring interviews with the band and never-before seen footage, the film features behind-the-scenes views of historic moments from the perspective of the band, their fans, crew and management throughout their sold-out 40th anniversary tour

programme.title: Rocky V
programme.desc: The one-time champ, Rocky Balboa, hits rock bottom and winds up in his old Philadelphia neighborhood. He trains a young boxer, Tommy Gunn, who becomes ungrateful. In spite of brain damage, Rocky is willing to risk another bout

programme.title: Inside Man
programme.desc: Detective Frazier (Academy Award winner Denzel Washington) is a tough cop who matches wits with a clever bank robber named Dalton (Academy Award nominee Clive Owen). As the dangerous cat-and-mouse game unfolds, a wild card emerges: Madaline (Academy Award winner Jodie Foster), a power broker with a hidden agenda. Directed by Spike Lee
Returning to his hometown, US Marine Nelson Sanchez finds himself trapped by the violent past he had tried to escape

programme.title: The Darkest Hour
programme.desc: Five young people find themselves stranded in Moscow, fighting to survive in the wake of a devastating alien attack in this sci-fi action thriller directed by Chris Gorak. Starring Emile Hirsch and Oliva Thirlby

programme.title: Cop Land
programme.desc: Freddy Heflin (Sylvester Stallone) is the sheriff of a place everyone calls Cop Land - a small and seemingly peaceful town populated by the big city police officers he's long admired. Yet something ugly is taking place behind the town's peaceful facade and Freddy uncovers a massive, deadly conspiracy among the local residents. He is forced to take action and make a dangerous choice between protecting his idols and upholding the law

programme.title: Pilot
programme.desc: A fateful event sends shockwaves through a community on the South Side of Chicago and connects the lives of Brandon, Ronnie, Emmett and Kevin in wholly unexpected ways. Series premiere(c)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Violence, Nudity

programme.title: Rocky V
programme.desc: The one-time champ, Rocky Balboa, hits rock bottom and winds up in his old Philadelphia neighborhood. He trains a young boxer, Tommy Gunn, who becomes ungrateful. In spite of brain damage, Rocky is willing to risk another bout

programme.title: Operation Condor
programme.desc: Jackie Chan and his bumbling sidekick are sent on a quest through Europe to find a mysterious treasure held by a shadowy organization of monks(n)

programme.title: 2017 Super Bowl Recap
programme.desc: Super Bowl LII wrap-up. Host James Brown and expert analysts Phil Simms, Boomer Esiason, Ray Lewis and Brandon Marshall break down all the Patriots vs. Eagles hot topics. Season finale(n)

programme.title: Overeem vs. Rogers (R)
programme.desc: Strikeforce and Showtime return to the Gateway City for this championship match that finds The Netherlands' Alistair Overeem defending his heavyweight champion title against St. Paul, Minnesota native Brett "The Grim" Rogers in a card dubbed "Heavy Artillery."(n)

programme.title: Rocky III
programme.desc: Rocky Balboa (Sylvester Stallone) has been champion for three years, and has defeated all challengers. His marriage to Adrian (Talia Shire) is thriving, his son is happy and Rocky becomes complacent. His next challenger is a dangerous boxer named Clubber Lang (Mr. T). Rocky's manager, Mickey (Burgess Meredith), takes a look at Lang and advises Rocky to hang it up. Later Mickey dies and Rocky realizes that he must find a new fighting style. He turns to ex-champ Apollo Creed (Carl Weathers) for help(n)

programme.title: Arsenal
programme.desc: Family loyalty is tested when a successful businessman (Adrian Grenier) is willing to do anything for his deadbeat brother (Johnathon Schaech) — including tracking down the vicious mobster (Nicolas Cage) holding him hostage(n)

programme.title: Lavell Crawford: Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: Lavell is back home in St. Louis in his new comedy special. He discusses every holiday from what Christmas was like when he was a kid, to the guilt everyone feels on Mother's Day, to Thanksgiving and his family trips to Disneyland(n)

programme.title: Operation Condor
programme.desc: Jackie Chan and his bumbling sidekick are sent on a quest through Europe to find a mysterious treasure held by a shadowy organization of monks(n)

programme.title: Running For His Life: The Lawrence Phillips Story
programme.desc: Feature length documentary examining the troubled life and tragic death of college football standout and talented NFL running back Lawrence Phillips, whose scars of childhood abuse and abandonment haunted him throughout his career(n)

programme.title: Young Guns
programme.desc: Six young men, led by Billy the Kid, are hired to guard an Englishman's ranch against a mob in 1870s New Mexico(n)

programme.title: The Game
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Michael Douglas stars as a man who's chosen to participate in a live-action game that penetrates all aspects of his life. But when it begins to go out of control, he tries to escape. Directed by David Fincher(n)

programme.title: Sniper: Legacy
programme.desc: A rogue gunman is assassinating high-ranking military officers one by one. When Gunnery Sgt. Brandon Beckett (Chad Michael Collins) is informed his father, legendary shooter Thomas Beckett (Tom Berenger), has been killed, Brandon springs into action to take out the perpetrator. But when his father rescues him from an ambush, Brandon realizes he's a pawn being played by his superiors to draw out the killer. It's up to the two men, to bring an end to the carnage(n)

programme.title: Rocky IV
programme.desc: Rocky Balboa (Sylvester Stallone) is a champ again. When there is a challenge from a Soviet giant named Drago (Dolph Lundgren), the challenger is laughed off. The Soviet government wants the prestige of a World Heavyweight Boxing Championship and stands fully behind Drago - a cold, blond, almost-bloodless fighting machine who is somewhat inhuman. Apollo Creed (Carl Weathers) is now Rocky's manager and is appalled by the effrontery of the challenge. To teach the upstart a lesson in boxing, Apollo agrees to an exhibition match in Las Vegas(n)

programme.title: 25th Hour
programme.desc: In 24 short hours Monty (Edward Norton) goes to prison for seven years. Once a king of Manhattan, Monty is about to say good-bye to the life he knew. On his last day on the outside, Monty tries to reconnect with his father (Brian Cox) and gets together with his two old friends, Jacob (Philip Seymour Hoffman) and Slaughtery (Barry Pepper). There's also his girlfriend, Naturelle (Rosario Dawson), who may or may not have been the one who tipped off the cops(n)

programme.title: Alee
programme.desc: Brandon reels from a loss as Ronnie realizes he's made a mistake. Meanwhile, Emmett's carefree life is upended. Papa and Jake taunt Kevin over his crush on Andrea. Detective Cruz is shaken by conflicting clues in the investigation(n)

programme.title: Cupid's Proxy
programme.desc: Rebecca Murphy is a cynical widow whose whole world revolves around her 12 year old son, Justin - a budding musician who can't remember his late father. Rebecca has no desire to date despite efforts by her feisty neighbor, Olive, who has a love advice column called Call Me Cupid. When Olive is pressured by her editor to get with the times, she enlists Justin to help her answer a letter. Unbeknownst to Justin, she publishes his advice under the alter ego, Cupid's Proxy

programme.title: Splash
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars as a man now reunited with the mermaid who saved him from drowning as a boy. He falls in love with her not knowing who or what she is

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: Terrence Howard stars in this rousing true-life story of a Philadelphia swim coach in the mid-1970s who faces racism in trying to land a coaching position, and instead transforms a group of trash-talking inner-city teenagers into a championship squad. Bernie Mac, Kimberly Elise and Tom Arnold costar in this inspiring drama

programme.title: Becoming Bulletproof
programme.desc: Documentary following the making of a rip-roaring Western costume drama featuring a diverse group of disabled people from across the US, which tells a moving story of big screen barriers and raises questions about why we so rarely see disabled actors on film

programme.title: Splash
programme.desc: Tom Hanks stars as a man now reunited with the mermaid who saved him from drowning as a boy. He falls in love with her not knowing who or what she is

programme.title: Knockin' on Dave's Door
programme.desc: Music legend Bob Dylan flies to London one day to visit his mate Dave Stewart. After getting lost, Bob finally arrives at the address and finds himself waiting for Dave in his flat dutifully being served tea by his girlfriend. But is he really in the right place? Starring Eddie Marsan, Paul Ritter and Katherine Parkinson

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Worth the Fall
programme.desc: When he witnesses a principal's sexual misconduct toward a student at the middle school where he works, an immigrant janitor must decide whether or not to report the incident - a choice that could get his wife deported

programme.title: The Art of the Steal
programme.desc: This eye-opening documentary tells the story of the Barnes Collection, $25 billion worth of masterpieces by Cezanne, Matisse and Renoir that has become the focus of a culture war between those who wish to preserve the intentions of the collection's original owner, and a conspiracy of politically powerful corporations seeking to profit by seizing and relocating the artwork

programme.title: Perfect in '76
programme.desc: SHOWTIME documentary revisiting the ‘76 Hoosiers and renowned coach Bobby Knight, who led his Indiana team to a perfect 32-0 season and a national championship

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world

programme.title: Muhammad Ali: The Greatest. Of All Time.
programme.desc: In the early 1980s, after his recent and high profile defeat to Larry Holmes, boxing legend Muhammad Ali takes it upon himself to talk a suicidal stranger down from a ledge. Using his unique brand of wit and wisdom, he succeeds in persuading the man that life is worth living, and learns a huge amount about himself in the process. Starring Noel Clarke as Muhammad Ali, Osy Ikhile as Joe, Lucian Msamati as Herbert Muhammad and Danny John-Jules as Don King

programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life
programme.desc: Rafe has an epic imagination and a slight problem with authority. When he transfers to a new school, Rafe and his scheming best friend Leo hatch a plan to break every rule in the school's code of conduct. This causes a battle with the principal, which explodes into chaos both real and imagined. Rafe struggles to hide his misbehavior from Jeanne, the straight-A, overachieving girl of his dreams, while at home, his mother's boyfriend - a moochy, jack-of-no-trades named Bear - threatens to become his stepfather

programme.title: Cody the Robosapien
programme.desc: When a 12-year-old boy discovers a broken robot, he finds a zany and powerful new best friend who can change his life for the better but when the evil corporation that funded the robot's creation intervenes, the pair must team up to save their family

programme.title: Fair Haven
programme.desc: A young piano prodigy returns to his family farm, after a long stay in a gay conversion therapy, and is torn between the expectations of his emotionally distant father and the memory of a past, loving relationship he's tried to bury

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer

programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life
programme.desc: Rafe has an epic imagination and a slight problem with authority.
